cocktails.description: Profile: A bold, spirit-forward agave spirit drink built around **mezcal**, **Cognac**, **Punt e Mes** bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Key ingredients: **mezcal**, **Cognac**, **Punt e Mes**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 22.5ml of **mezcal**, 22.5ml of **Cognac**, 30ml of **Punt e Mes**, 15ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, and 2 dashes of **creole bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: 20th Century
cocktails.description: Profile: The 20th Century cocktail is a classic cocktail that was first created in 1937 by a British bartender C.A. Tuck and named in honor of the celebrated 20th. Key ingredients: **gin**, **Lillet Blanc**, **lime juice**, **Crème de Cacao White**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 20ml of **Lillet Blanc**, 20ml of **Crème de Cacao White**, and 10ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express an **orange** zest twist over the cocktail and use it as garnish.

cocktails.description: Profile: This cocktail is similar to the Cuba Libre and may refer to any drink consisting of **whiskey** mixed with a **lemon** soft drink. It was originally made. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **lemon**, **Seagram's 7 Crown whiskey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **whiskey** and 150ml of **7-Up**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: ABC
cocktails.description: Profile: The abbreviation stands for **amaretto**, **Baileys** and **Cognac**. Key ingredients: **amaretto**, **Baileys**, **Cognac**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of **amaretto** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of **Baileys** on top of the **amaretto**.
3. Using a teaspoon, pour 15ml of **Cognac** on top of the **Baileys**.

cocktails.name: Acapulco
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical long drink that combines Tequila and **white rum** with **pineapple** and **grapefruit juice**, balanced by fresh **lime juice** and a touch of. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **pineapple**, **grapefruit juice**, **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila blanco**, 50ml of **white rum**, 75ml of **pineapple juice**, 50ml of **grapefruit juice**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 10ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass over fresh **ice**.

cocktails.name: Adonis
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic cocktail created in 1884 and named after the first broadway musical to run for more than 500 performances. The ratio of sherry and vermouth may be.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **amontillado sherry**, 45ml of **red vermouth**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with **orange** zest.

cocktails.name: Adriatique
cocktails.description: Profile: A complex liqueur cocktail where **Amaro Nonino** and **Aperol** meet citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with **orange**. Key ingredients: **Amaro Nonino**, **Aperol**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Amaro Nonino**, 15ml of **Aperol**, and 30ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **orange**.

cocktails.name: Affogato cocktail
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, dessert-style blended cocktail inspired by affogato, combining **grappa**, **coffee liqueur**, crème de cacao, **espresso**, and **ice cream** for a. Key ingredients: **grappa**, **coffee liqueur**, **espresso**, **ice cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients with three cubes of **ice**.
2. Pour into a chilled glass.
3. Garnish with 3 **coffee beans** floated in a petal formation in the centre of the cocktail’s foamy head.

cocktails.name: After Eight
cocktails.description: Profile: Inspired by the classic **mint** **chocolate** thin, the after eight cocktail is a rich, indulgent dessert drink that can be served as a sophisticated. Key ingredients: **mint**, **chocolate**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the **coffee liqueur** into the bottom of a shot glass.
2. Carefully float the crème de menthe over the back of a spoon to create a distinct layer.
3. Slowly layer the **Irish cream** on top using the same spoon technique.

cocktails.name: Agavoni
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold, spirit-forward agave spirit drink built around **Tequila blanco**, **red vermouth**, **Campari**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well. Key ingredients: **Tequila blanco**, **red vermouth**, **Campari**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Tequila blanco**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, and 30ml of **Campari**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Alabama Slammer (long)
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold and fruity southern classic combining **Southern Comfort**, **amaretto**, and **sloe gin**, topped with **orange juice**. Sweet, rich, and. Key ingredients: **Southern Comfort**, **amaretto**, **sloe gin**, **orange juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Southern Comfort**, 20ml of **amaretto**, 20ml of **sloe gin**, 90ml of **orange juice**, and 10ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a collins glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Alabama Slammer (shot)
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic southern party shot made with **amaretto**, **Southern Comfort**, and **sloe gin**, balanced with **orange juice**. Sweet, fruity, and deceptively. Key ingredients: **amaretto**, **Southern Comfort**, **sloe gin**, **orange juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 servings:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Southern Comfort**, 45ml of **amaretto**, 45ml of **sloe gin**, 22.5ml of **orange juice**, and 22.5ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.

cocktails.name: Alexander
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic, rich, and velvety cocktail combining **gin**, white crème de cacao, and **cream**. The alexander is smooth, lightly sweet, and dessert-like, with. Key ingredients: **gin**, **cream**, **chocolate**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **gin**, 22.5ml of **Crème de Cacao White**, 22.5ml of **cream**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Alexander the Great
cocktails.description: Profile: A luxurious, dessert-style cocktail that blends smooth **vodka** with rich **coffee liqueur** and white crème de cacao, finished with fresh **cream** for a. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **cream**, **chocolate**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **coffee liqueur**, 15ml of **Crème de Cacao White**, 22.5ml of **cream** and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **cocoa powder** and/or a pinch of **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Alexander's Big Brother
cocktails.description: Profile: A decadent, creamy **gin**-based cocktail combining **gin**, **triple sec**, and **Blue Curaçao**. Silky, dessert-like, and indulgent, with a subtle citrus. Key ingredients: **gin**, **triple sec**, **Blue Curaçao**, **physalis**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **gin**, 7.5ml of **triple sec**, 22.5ml of **Blue Curaçao**, 22.5ml of **cream**, 5ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **physalis**.

cocktails.name: Alexander's Sister
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic creamy **gin** cocktail with bright green crème de menthe and smooth **cream**, creating a dessert-like balance of herbal freshness and silky. Key ingredients: **gin**, **cream**, **mint**, **nutmeg**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Crème de Menthe Green**, 15ml of **cream**, 5ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **mint** leaf and a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Alien Brain Haemorrhage
cocktails.description: Profile: A visually striking layered shooter that looks like a floating brain in liquid. Sweet **peach schnapps** forms the base, creamy **Baileys** curdles into. Key ingredients: **peach schnapps**, **Baileys**, **Blue Curaçao**, **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour **peach schnapps** into a chilled shooter glass as the base.
2. Slowly drip **Baileys** **Irish cream** into the schnapps using a spoon or the back of a straw so it curdles and forms."brain" shapes.
3. Gently add a few drops of **Blue Curaçao** and **grenadine** on top to create a bleeding effect.
4. Serve immediately and drink in one shot.

cocktails.name: Alien Brain Tumor
cocktails.description: Profile: This one looks really gross, but you'll like it.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **Blue Curaçao** into a shooter glass.
2. Slowly layer 20ml of **Baileys**(**Irish cream** liqueur) so it forms a brain-like shape.
3. Add 5ml of **grenadine**, one drop at a time to create a bleeding effect.

cocktails.name: Alpine Avenger
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy dessert cocktail combining the cool freshness of **peppermint schnapps** with the smooth sweetness of white crème de cacao and **milk**. Key ingredients: **peppermint schnapps**, **milk**, **mint**, **chocolate**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **peppermint schnapps** and white crème de cacao into a heat-resistant glass or Irish coffee glass.
2. Heat the **milk** gently until hot but not boiling.
3. Pour the hot **milk** into the glass and stir gently to combine all ingredients.
4. Garnish with grated **chocolate**, **chocolate** shavings, or a light dusting of **cocoa powder**.
5. Serve immediately while warm and enjoy.

cocktails.name: Amado
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich and silky rum-based cocktail with delicate floral sweetness from **rose syrup** and a velvety texture from **egg white**. Elegant, dessert-like, and. Key ingredients: **rose syrup**, **egg white**.

2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a drop of Angostura bitter.

cocktails.name: Amalia
cocktails.description: Profile: A light, sparkling rum cocktail designed for effortless sipping. Fresh **kiwi fruit**, **lime** and floral elderflower are balanced by **white rum** and. Key ingredients: **kiwi fruit**, **lime**, **white rum**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Cut **kiwi fruit** in half and use a spoon to scoop flesh from one half into shaker.
2. In a shaker, muddle fresh **kiwi fruit** pieces to release juice and aroma.
3. Add 50ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 30ml of **elderflower cordial** to the shaker.
4. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake briefly to combine and chill.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Top gently with **ginger ale**.
7. Give a light stir to integrate the layers without losing bubbles.
8. Garnish with a fresh **mint** sprig and a thin slice of **kiwi fruit**.

2. Add 60ml of **amaretto** and 30ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over an **ice** cube.
5. Garnish with 3 maraschino cherries and an **orange** slice.

3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled collins glass.
5. Garnish with a **grapefruit** slice.

cocktails.name: Ambassador

2. Add 45ml of **Tequila blanco**, 90ml of **orange juice**, and 5ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: AMF
cocktails.description: Profile: AMF (adios, motherf***er) is a potent long drink combining multiple white spirits with citrus. Despite its bright appearance, it is strong and is typically. Key ingredients: ***er) is a potent long drink combining multiple white spirits with citrus. Despite its bright appearance, it is strong and is typically served over plenty of **.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **Tequila blanco**, 15ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Blue Curaçao**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and 60ml of **lemon-lime soda**.

cocktails.name: Bacardi Cocktail

5. Garnish with a slice of **banana**.

cocktails.name: Bali Trader
cocktails.description: Profile: The bali trader is a vibrant, exotic cocktail characterized by its tropical fusion of **banana** and **pineapple** flavours. Key ingredients: **banana**, **pineapple**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **vodka**, 25ml of **banana liqueur green**, and 25ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **banana** slice.

cocktails.name: Bamboo Classic
cocktails.description: Profile: A refined, low-ABV classic that showcases the dry, nutty character of sherry balanced with herbal vermouth and bright **orange bitters**. Elegant, crisp,. Key ingredients: **orange bitters**, **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **fino sherry**, 50ml of **dry vermouth**, 2 dashes of **orange bitters**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe or nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Bamboo Modern
cocktails.description: Profile: A modern, aromatic twist on the classic bamboo cocktail. Dry sherry forms the backbone, layered with both red and **dry vermouth** for herbal depth, while. Key ingredients: **dry vermouth**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **amontillado sherry**, 15ml of **red vermouth**, 15ml of **dry vermouth**, 15ml of **bianco vermouth**, and 1 dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe or nick & nora glass.
5. Express an **orange** peel over the drink, garnish, and serve.

cocktails.name: Banana Calling
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright and aromatic **gin** sour balancing botanical **gin**, dry sherry and ripe **banana liqueur** with fresh citrus and a subtle touch of sweetness for. Key ingredients: **gin**, **banana liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **gin**, 10ml of **amontillado sherry**, 15ml of **banana liqueur**, 20ml of **lemon juice**, and 10ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **banana** or a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Banana Colada
cocktails.description: Profile: A creamy tropical cocktail combining **white rum**, **coconut syrup**, and **banana liqueur** for a smooth, sweet, and beach-style flavour profile. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **coconut syrup**, **banana liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a blender with **ice**.
2. Add **white rum**, **banana liqueur**, **coconut syrup**, and fresh **pineapple juice**.
3. Blend until smooth and slightly frothy.
4. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a **banana** slice, **pineapple** wedge, or a **cherry** and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Banana Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Profile: A smooth and tropical twist on the classic Daiquiri, combining **white rum** with ripe **banana** and fresh **lime juice**. The natural sweetness of. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **banana**, **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **white rum**, **banana liqueur** or fresh **banana**, **lime juice** and **simple syrup** into a blender.
2. Add a generous handful of **ice**.
3. Blend until smooth and creamy with no large **ice** chunks remaining.
4. Taste and adjust sweetness or acidity if needed.
5. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
6. Garnish with a **banana** slice or **lime** wheel and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Banana Daiquiri (shaken)
cocktails.description: Profile: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Daiquiri, combining **aged rum** with rich **banana liqueur**, fresh **lime juice**, and a hint of **bitters**. The. Key ingredients: **aged rum**, **banana liqueur**, **lime juice**, **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **aged rum**, 30ml of **banana liqueur**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 6 drops of **Daiquiri bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **banana**.

cocktails.name: Banana Fantasy
cocktails.description: Profile: A creamy tropical mocktail with ripe **banana**, **coconut syrup**, and bright citrus notes. Smooth, refreshing, and perfectly balanced between sweetness. Key ingredients: **banana**, **coconut syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 1 **banana**, 50ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **coconut syrup**, and 100ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Banana Flash
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright and tropical non-alcoholic cocktail with ripe **banana** sweetness and a fresh, fruity character. Light, refreshing, and perfect for warm weather. Key ingredients: **banana**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add a **banana**, a **peach**, and 150ml of **orange juice** into a blender.
2. Add a handful of **ice**.
3. Blend until smooth and creamy.
4. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a **banana** slice or citrus wedge and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bananarama
cocktails.description: Profile: A bananarama cocktail is a tropical, fruit-forward drink that typically features **Crème de Banane** or purée as its primary flavour. Because it is a modern. Key ingredients: **Crème de Banane**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle the **banana** slices with the **Cachaça** and rum in the base of a shaker.
2. Add all other ingredients and fill the shaker with **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously and fine-strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Banshee
cocktails.description: Profile: This mild, sweet and creamy shot is named after a female spirit in Irish and Celtic folklore, who foretells the death of a family member of the person who.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Crème de Banane**, 50ml of **Crème de Cacao White**, and 50ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Barbara
cocktails.description: Profile: A smooth, dessert-style cocktail combining **vodka**, white crème de cacao, and **milk**. Sweet, creamy, and softly chocolatey, barbara is an indulgent. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **milk**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 22.5ml of **Crème de Cacao White**, and 45ml of **milk**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **cocoa powder** and a pinch of **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Barracuda
cocktails.description: Profile: An IBA official sparkling cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gold rum**, 15ml of **Galliano**, 60ml of **pineapple juice**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Top with 45ml of **sparkling wine**.
6. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple** and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Basil Julep
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold, spirit-forward twist on the classic julep, where fresh **basil** replaces **mint** to bring deep herbal notes and a slightly peppery aroma. Rich. Key ingredients: **basil**, **mint**, **bourbon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add fresh **basil** leaves and **simple syrup** to a rocks glass.
2. Gently muddle the **basil** to release its essential oils and aroma without shredding the leaves.
3. Pour in the **bourbon** and fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
4. Stir gently until the drink is well chilled and slightly diluted.
5. Top with more crushed **ice** to form a small dome.
6. Garnish with a fresh **basil** sprig and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Batida
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy brazilian cocktail made with **Cachaça**, **coconut water**, and **condensed milk**. Sweet, tropical, and dessert-like, with a smooth,. Key ingredients: **Cachaça**, **coconut water**, **condensed milk**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Cachaça**, 60ml of **coconut water**, 30ml of **condensed milk**, and 7.5ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Bay Breeze
cocktails.description: Profile: A refreshing **vodka** cocktail showcasing **vodka**, **cranberry juice**, and **pineapple juice**—vibrant, fruity, and easy to savor. Garnished with a. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **cranberry juice**, **pineapple juice**, **pineapple**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 60ml of **pineapple juice**, and 90ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge and 3 maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Beach Blonde
cocktails.description: Profile: A creamy, tropical indulgence that marries the velvety texture of **egg liqueur** with the bold heat of **overproof rum**. Balanced by fresh **banana** and. Key ingredients: **egg liqueur**, **overproof rum**, **banana**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Peel the fresh **banana** and place it into a shaker.
2. Muddle the **banana** thoroughly until it reaches a smooth, puree-like consistency.
3. Add 90ml of **egg liqueur**, 30ml of **overproof rum**, and 90ml of **orange juice** into the shaker.
4. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds to ensure a creamy texture.
5. Strain the mixture into a highball glass filled with fresh **ice**.
6. Garnish with a **banana** slice and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bee's Knees
cocktails.description: Profile: A prohibition-era mix of **gin**, **lemon**, and **honey** for a bright, silky sour. Key ingredients: **gin**, **lemon**, **honey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **honey syrup**, 25ml of **lemon juice**, and 25ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** or **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Bee's Nice
cocktails.description: Profile: A long, **sparkling wine** drink built for easy sipping, pairing **Everclear**, **honey syrup**, **Prosecco** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Garnished. Key ingredients: **sparkling wine**, **Everclear**, **honey syrup**, **Prosecco**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Everclear**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 30ml of **honey syrup**, and 45ml of **Prosecco**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Bellini
cocktails.description: Profile: Italian **sparkling wine** mixed with **peach** purée for a light, fruity spritz. Key ingredients: **sparkling wine**, **peach**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Peel and pit fresh white peaches, then blend or mash until smooth. Strain through a fine-mesh sieve to remove pulp if desired.
2. Pour 60ml of the **peach purée** into a chilled Champagne flute.
3. Slowly top with 120ml of chilled **Prosecco**. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a fresh peach slice to the rim.

cocktails.name: Bentley
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated classic that balances the crisp **apple** notes of **Calvados** with the rich, botanical sweetness of **dubonnet**. This elegant drink is. Key ingredients: **apple**, **Calvados**, **dubonnet**, **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a coupe with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Calvados**, 45ml of **dubonnet**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** peel.

cocktails.name: Berlin Wall
cocktails.description: Profile: The mix of Tequila, **lime juice**, **falernum** and **orange bitters** creates a brightness and depth that makes the berlin wall well worth a visit. Key ingredients: **lime juice**, **falernum**, **orange bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila reposado**, 22.5ml of **falernum**, 22.5ml of **lime juice**, 2 dashes of **orange bitters**, and 1 peel of **orange**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Between the Sheets
cocktails.description: Profile: A citrus-forward variation on the Sidecar with **Cognac**, rum, and **triple sec**. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **triple sec**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Cognac**, 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **triple sec**, and 20ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Bijou
cocktails.description: Profile: First described in harry johnson's book 'bartender's manual', this herbal cocktail is a classic from the late 1800s. The original recipe had equal parts. Key ingredients: **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, 20ml of **green Chartreuse**, and 1 dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Bird of Paradise
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical rum cocktail with **spiced rum**, **Aperol**, **pineapple juice**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with. Key ingredients: **spiced rum**, **Aperol**, **pineapple juice**, **pineapple**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **spiced rum**, 22.5ml of **Aperol**, 45ml of **pineapple juice**, 15ml of **demerara sugar syrup**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with 3 leaves of **pineapple** and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Bitter in Brazil
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical rum cocktail with **Cachaça**, **Orange Curaçao**, **Punt e Mes**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Key ingredients: **Cachaça**, **Orange Curaçao**, **Punt e Mes**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cachaça**, 22.5ml of **Orange Curaçao**, 22.5ml of **Punt e Mes**, 5ml of **rich simple syrup**, 0.5 bar spoons of **Fernet Branca**, 15ml of **water**, and 1 twist of **orange**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice**.

cocktails.name: Black Lebowski
cocktails.description: Profile: Simple and spirit-forward blend of **vodka** and **coffee liqueur**. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka** and 30ml of **coffee liqueur**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Blackberry Fig Smash
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright agave spirit sour balancing **Tequila blanco**, **agave syrup**, **blackberry** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing. Key ingredients: **Tequila blanco**, **agave syrup**, **blackberry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila blanco**, 30ml of **lime juice**, 30ml of **agave syrup**, 8 **blackberries**, and 1 **fig**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with half a **fig** and 5g of **salt**.

cocktails.name: Blood and Sand
cocktails.description: Profile: A complex **whiskey** cocktail where **Scotch Whisky**, **red vermouth**, **cherry brandy** meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **Scotch Whisky**, **red vermouth**, **cherry brandy**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Scotch Whisky**, 30ml of **cherry brandy**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, and 30ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.description: Profile: A savory **vodka** cocktail with **tomato juice**, spices, and a peppery bite. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **tomato juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. In a mixing tin, add 45ml of **vodka**, 90ml of **tomato juice**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 2 dashes of **worcestershire sauce**, 2 dashes of **Tabasco**, a pinch of **celery salt**, and a pinch of **black pepper**.
2. Add plenty of **ice** to the tin with the ingredients.
3. Hold the second empty tin below and slightly to the side of the first one.
4. Pour the cocktail in a long, controlled stream from the first tin into the second tin.
Let the liquid fall through the air— this aerates the drink and chills it gently.
5. Pour the liquid back into the first tin in the same way.
6. Repeat this back-and-forth “throw” 5 times.
The goal is to chill and lightly dilute the drink without over-diluting or bruising it.
7. Strain into a highball glass.
8. Garnish with a **celery** stalk and a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Blow Job
cocktails.description: Profile: A delicious and very popular shooter with controversial references.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **amaretto** liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 20ml of **Baileys** on top of the **amaretto**.
3. Top with **whipped cream**.

cocktails.name: Blue Hawaii
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical rum cocktail with **white rum**, **vodka**, **Blue Curaçao**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with **cherry**. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **vodka**, **Blue Curaçao**, **cherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 20ml of **white rum**, 20ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **Blue Curaçao**, 90ml of **pineapple juice**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **simple syrup** into a blender.
2. Add crushed **ice** and blend until smooth.
3. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a **cherry** and a **pineapple** wedge.
5. Serve with straws.

cocktails.name: Blue Hawaii Mocktail
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical mocktail with **pineapple juice**, **Blue Curaçao syrup**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with **cherry**. Key ingredients: **pineapple juice**, **Blue Curaçao syrup**, **cherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 90ml of **pineapple juice**, 30ml of **orange juice**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **Blue Curaçao syrup**, and 15ml of **simple syrup** into a blender.
2. Add crushed **ice** and blend until smooth.
3. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a **cherry** and a **pineapple** wedge.
5. Serve with straws.

cocktails.name: Blue Jellyfish
cocktails.description: Profile: A blue jellyfish is a visually striking, layered cocktail or shot designed to mimic the appearance of a jellyfish floating in the Ocean. Its signature look. Key ingredients: **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the **Blue Curaçao** into a glass first to create the deep blue base.
2. Slowly layer the **vodka** and/or white **sambuca** on top.
3. Add a few drops of **Disaronno Velvet** or **Irish cream**(like **Baileys**) to the very top.

cocktails.name: Blue Kamikaze
cocktails.description: Profile: The shot variation of the IBA official kamikaze cocktail. The recipe here is for 3 shots. Blue kamikaze can also be made as a long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **vodka**, 50ml of **Blue Curaçao**, and 50ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.

cocktails.name: Blue Lady
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy **gin** drink featuring **Blue Curaçao**, **gin**, **egg white**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Key ingredients: **gin**, **Blue Curaçao**, **egg white**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **Blue Curaçao**, 30ml of **gin**, 20ml of **lemon juice**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Express oil from an **orange** twist and garnish with it.

cocktails.name: Blue Lagoon
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward **vodka** cocktail showcasing **vodka**, **Blue Curaçao**, **lemonade**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with **lemon**. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **Blue Curaçao**, **lemonade**, **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a hurricane glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **Blue Curaçao**, and 120ml of **lemonade**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Blue Lagoon Mocktail
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright mocktail balancing **lemonade** and **Blue Curaçao syrup** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with. Key ingredients: **lemonade**, **Blue Curaçao syrup**, **lemon**, **cherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a hurricane glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **orange juice**, 30ml of **Blue Curaçao syrup**, and 120ml of **lemonade**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Blue Ocean
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright **vodka** sour balancing **vodka**, **Blue Curaçao**, **grapefruit juice** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **Blue Curaçao**, **grapefruit juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **Blue Curaçao**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and 60ml of **grapefruit juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled snifter glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Blueberry Tea
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward spirit cocktail showcasing **amaretto**, **Grand Marnier**, **black tea**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with **lemon**. Key ingredients: **amaretto**, **Grand Marnier**, **black tea**, **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. **Select** and pre-heat an Irish coffee glass.
2. Pour all ingredients into pre-warmed glass.
3. Express **lemon** zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
4. Garnish with **cinnamon** stick.

cocktails.name: BMW
cocktails.description: Profile: The name is an acronym for **Baileys**, Malibu, and **whiskey**. Key ingredients: **Baileys**, **whiskey**.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Baileys**, 50ml of Malibu, and 50ml of **whiskey**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Bobby Burns
cocktails.description: Profile: A complex **whiskey** cocktail where **Scotch Whisky**, **red vermouth**, **Benedictine** meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **Scotch Whisky**, **red vermouth**, **Benedictine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Scotch Whisky**, 45ml of **red vermouth**, and 22.5ml of **Benedictine**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** peel.

cocktails.name: Bolo Cocktail
cocktails.description: Profile: A complex rum cocktail where **white rum**, **Angostura Bitters** meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **Angostura Bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **white rum**, 20ml of **lemon juice**, 10ml of **orange juice**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Bombardino
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy **brandy** drink featuring **Cognac**, **advocaat**, **whipped cream**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **Cognac**, **advocaat**, **whipped cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Heat the liqueur: gently heat the **egg liqueur** in a small saucepan over medium-low heat. Do not let it boil, as this may cause the eggs to curdle.
2. Add **brandy**: once hot, stir in the **brandy**. Some recipes suggest heating the **brandy** with the liqueur, while others recommend adding it directly to the serving glass before pouring in the hot liqueur.
3. Garnish: pour into a heat-resistant glass or mug. Top with a generous dollop of **whipped cream** and a sprinkle of **cinnamon** or cocoa.

cocktails.name: Bombardino Calimero
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy **brandy** drink featuring **Cognac**, **advocaat**, **espresso**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **Cognac**, **advocaat**, **espresso**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Warm the **advocaat** and **espresso** together in a small saucepan over low heat until hot but not boiling.
2. Add the **Cognac** to a heat-safe cup.
3. Pour the hot **advocaat**-**espresso** mixture over the **Cognac** and stir gently.
4. Top with **whipped cream**.
5. Finish with a dusting of **cinnamon** and optional **cocoa powder**, then serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bombardino Pirata
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy rum drink featuring **gold rum**, **advocaat**, **whipped cream**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Key ingredients: **gold rum**, **advocaat**, **whipped cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Heat the liqueur: pour the **egg liqueur** into a small saucepan. Heat it over medium-low heat until hot but not boiling (boiling may cause the **egg** base to curdle).
2. Combine: in a heat-safe glass or small mug, add the rum. Pour the hot **egg liqueur** over the rum and stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish: top with a generous dollop of **whipped cream**.
4. Finish: sprinkle **cocoa powder** or **cinnamon** on top and serve immediately while hot.

cocktails.name: Bombardino Scozzese
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy **whiskey** drink featuring whisky, **advocaat**, **whipped cream**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **advocaat**, **whipped cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Warm the **advocaat** in a small saucepan over low heat until hot but not boiling.
2. Add the whisky to a heat-safe cup.
3. Pour the hot **advocaat** over the whisky and stir gently to combine.
4. Top with **whipped cream**.
5. Sprinkle with **cinnamon** and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.description: Profile: A **whiskey**-based Negroni with **bourbon**, sweet vermouth, and **Campari**. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **bourbon**, **Campari**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **bourbon**, 30ml of **Campari**, and 30ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a rock glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Brain Tumor
cocktails.description: Profile: This one looks really gross, but you'll like it.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **peach schnapps** into a shooter glass.
2. Slowly layer 20ml of **Baileys**(**Irish cream** liqueur) so it forms a brain-like shape.
3. Add 5ml of **grenadine**, one drop at a time to create a bleeding effect.

cocktails.name: Bramble
cocktails.description: Profile: A modern **gin** sour swirled with **blackberry liqueur**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **blackberry liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **gin**, 25ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **Crème de Mure**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **lemon** and 2 blackberries.

cocktails.name: Brandy Alexander
cocktails.description: Profile: A creamy blend of **Cognac** and **chocolate liqueur**. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **chocolate liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Cognac** or **brandy**, 30ml of **Crème de Cacao White** and 30ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Brandy Crusta
cocktails.description: Profile: A citrusy **brandy** cocktail with curaçao, maraschino, and **bitters** served in a **sugar**-crusted glass. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **bitters**, **sugar**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac**, 7.5ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 15ml of **Orange Curaçao**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass rimmed with **lemon juice** and caster **sugar**.
5. Garnish with a twist of **lemon** and 5 g of **sugar**.

cocktails.name: Brandy Daisy
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic cocktail that dates back to the 19th Century.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **brandy**, 3 dashes of **white rum**, 3 dashes of **Orange Curaçao**, 3 dashes of **simple syrup**, and 15ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Top with soda. 
6. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Brandy Eggnog
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy **brandy** drink featuring **brandy**, **milk**, **egg**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **nutmeg**. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **milk**, **egg**, **nutmeg**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 40ml of **brandy**, 50ml of **milk**, 10ml of **simple syrup**, and an **egg yolk** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg** and a **cinnamon** stick.

cocktails.name: Brandy Sangaree
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and historical cocktail that balances the robust warmth of **Cognac** with the nutty, fortified sweetness of **tawny port**. A touch of. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **tawny port**, **rich simple syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac**, 22.5ml of **tawny port**, and 5ml of **rich simple syrup**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.

cocktails.name: Brandy Separator
cocktails.description: Profile: A variation of the 'white lebowski', this cocktail is close to the 'sneaky pete', but smoother. The amount of **milk** can be varied according to taste. Key ingredients: **milk**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **brandy** and 22.5ml of **coffee brandy**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Brave Bull
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward agave spirit cocktail showcasing **Tequila blanco**, **Kahlua**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Key ingredients: **Tequila blanco**, **Kahlua**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila blanco** and 30ml of **Kahlua**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice**.

cocktails.name: BRB
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward **whiskey** cocktail showcasing **bourbon**, **root beer**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **bourbon**, **root beer**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **bourbon** and 180ml of **root beer**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Breakfast Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward **gin** cocktail showcasing **gin**, **triple sec**, **orange marmalade**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with **lemon**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **triple sec**, **orange marmalade**, **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **gin**, 15ml of **triple sec**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 1 teaspoon of **orange marmalade**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a tiny toast with **orange marmalade**.

cocktails.name: Bronx
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic **gin** cocktail with sweet and **dry vermouth** brightened by **orange juice**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **dry vermouth**, **orange juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 15ml of **red vermouth**, 15ml of **dry vermouth**, and 30ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Buck's Fizz
cocktails.description: Profile: A long drink of **orange juice** topped with **sparkling wine**. Key ingredients: **orange juice**, **sparkling wine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 100ml of **sparkling wine** and 50ml of **orange juice** to a **Champagne** flute.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Bull Shot
cocktails.description: Profile: This is a variation of the Bloody Mary that became a popular cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 60ml of **beef bouillon**, 10ml of **lemon juice**, 1 dash of **worcestershire sauce**, 1 dash of **Tabasco**, 1 dash of **salt**, and 1 dash of **black pepper**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **celery** stalk and a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Bullfrog
cocktails.description: Profile: A strong and invigorating cocktail, something you'd want to order in a nightclub.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **Tequila blanco**, 30ml of **Blue Curaçao**, and 250ml of **Red Bull**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Bumbo
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward rum cocktail showcasing **white rum**, **cinnamon**, **nutmeg**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with **cinnamon sticks**. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **cinnamon**, **nutmeg**, **cinnamon sticks**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, 30ml of **water**, 1 pinch of **cinnamon**, 1 pinch of **nutmeg**, and 1 pinch of **allspice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **cinnamon** stick.

cocktails.name: Bushwacker
cocktails.description: Profile: A delicious, creamy long cocktail that is very similar to the piña colada. The recipe here is for 3 cocktails. A blender should be big enough to fit at.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the rum, **coffee liqueur**, crème de cacao, **cream** of coconut, **milk**, and **ice** into a blender.
2. Blend on high until the mixture is smooth, frothy, and reaches a milkshake-like consistency (typically 10–25 seconds).
3. Optional but traditional: drizzle **chocolate syrup** in a swirl inside a chilled hurricane glass.
4. Pour the blended mixture into the glass.
5. Top with a sprinkle of freshly grated **nutmeg** and maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Butterfinger
cocktails.description: Profile: A butterfinger cocktail or shot is a dessert-inspired drink designed to mimic the nutty, buttery flavors of the classic candy bar. Most variations rely on a.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka vanilla**, 30ml of **butterscotch liqueur**, 30ml of **Baileys**, and 30ml of **Kahlua**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Butterfinger Shot
cocktails.description: Profile: A butterfinger cocktail or shot is a dessert-inspired drink designed to mimic the nutty, buttery flavors of the classic candy bar. Most variations rely on a.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare the glass: roll half of the rim of a shot glass in heated **chocolate syrup**, then roll the same half in crushed butterfinger candy.
2. Layer the Kahlúa: pour 15ml of Kahlúa into the shot glass.
3. Add **butterscotch liqueur**: layer 15ml of **butterscotch liqueur** on top of the Kahlúa.
4. Layer **Baileys**: place a cocktail spoon(bowl side up) against the inside of the glass and slowly pour 15ml of **Baileys** over the back of the spoon to form a layer.
5. Add more crushed butterfinger candy.

cocktails.name: Buttery Nipple
cocktails.description: Profile: A variation of the "slippery nipple" cocktail but with butterscotch instead of **sambuca**. This one is even sweeter and softer than the original. Key ingredients: **sambuca**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of **butterscotch liqueur** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of **Baileys** on top.
3. Optionally, add a dash of **grenadine** syrup.

cocktails.name: Caipirão
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright spirit sour balancing **lime**, **sugar**, **Licor Beirão** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **lime**, **sugar**, **Licor Beirão**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **lime** wedges and **sugar** in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
3. Pour **Licor Beirão** over the **ice**.
4. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.description: Profile: Brazil's national cocktail of muddled **lime**, **sugar**, and **Cachaça** served over **ice**. Key ingredients: **lime**, **sugar**, **Cachaça**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **lime** wedges and **sugar** in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
3. Pour **Cachaça** over the **ice**.
4. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipirissima
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright rum sour balancing **lime**, **sugar**, **white rum** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **lime**, **sugar**, **white rum**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **lime** wedges and **sugar** in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
3. Pour rum over the **ice**.
4. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipiroska
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright **vodka** sour balancing **vodka**, **lime**, **sugar** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **lime**, **sugar**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **lime** wedges and **sugar** in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
3. Pour **vodka** over the **ice**.
4. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: California Root Beer
cocktails.description: Profile: A fizzy cocktail that mimics the taste of **root beer** with coffee and **vanilla** notes. Key ingredients: **root beer**, **vanilla**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake **vodka**, **Galliano**, **coffee liqueur**, and **rich simple syrup** with **ice**.
2. Strain into an **ice**-filled glass.
3. Top with **soda water**.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Calypso Coffee
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich coffee cocktail with **dark rum** and **Kahlua** finished with **cream**. Key ingredients: **dark rum**, **Kahlua**, **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **dark rum**, 30ml of **Kahlua**, 150ml of **espresso**, and 30ml of **heavy cream**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a coffee bean.

cocktails.name: Campari Gin Tonic
cocktails.description: Profile: A simple classic cocktail, but with the bitterness of **Campari** and a hint of sweetness. Key ingredients: **Campari**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **gin**, 20ml of **Campari**, and 100ml of **tonic**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge.

cocktails.name: Canary Flip
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold combination of wine and **egg liqueur**. Key ingredients: **egg liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **egg liqueur**, 60ml of **Sauvignon Blanc**, and 20ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Canchanchara
cocktails.description: Profile: A rustic cuban mix of **honey**, **lime**, and **white rum** served over **ice**. Key ingredients: **honey**, **lime**, **white rum**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **cuban aguardiente**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 45ml of **honey syrup**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Cantaritos
cocktails.description: Profile: A refreshing Mexican cocktail traditionally served in a clay pot.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila blanco**, 15ml of **orange juice**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 60ml of **grapefruit soda**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **grapefruit** slice.

cocktails.name: Cape Cod
cocktails.description: Profile: A simple mix of **vodka** and **cranberry juice** named after the massachusetts peninsula. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **cranberry juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **vodka** and 120ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Car Crash
cocktails.description: Profile: A sweet and fruity long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice** and add **amaretto**, **peach liqueur**, **Southern Comfort**(optional), **orange juice**, **lemon juice**, and **simple syrup**.
2. Shake well until chilled and strain into a tall collins glass filled with fresh **ice**.
3. Slowly pour 30ml of **grenadine** over the back of a spoon so it sinks to the bottom, creating a red."crash" effect.
4. Garnish with a **blood orange** slice and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Cardinale
cocktails.description: Profile: A dry, bittersweet Negroni variation with **gin**, **Campari**, and **dry vermouth**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **Campari**, **dry vermouth**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **gin**, 20ml of **dry vermouth**, and 10ml of **Campari**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Caribbean Treasure
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical liqueur cocktail with **lychee**, **coconut liqueur**, **strawberry liqueur**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Key ingredients: **lychee**, **coconut liqueur**, **strawberry liqueur**, **strawberry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 3 peeled and pitted lychees into a cocktail shaker.
2. Add the **coconut liqueur**, **strawberry liqueur**, and **pineapple juice** into the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice** cubes and shake vigorously until the mixture is well-chilled.
4. Double-strain into a highball glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with **strawberry** halves and a fresh **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Caribou Lou
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward rum cocktail showcasing **overproof rum**, **Malibu Rum**, **pineapple juice**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Key ingredients: **overproof rum**, **Malibu Rum**, **pineapple juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **overproof rum**, 30ml of **Malibu Rum**, 150ml of **pineapple juice**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with **pineapple** wedges and cherries.

cocktails.name: Caribbean Breeze
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical cocktail with light rum, **banana liqueur** and **pineapple juice**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Key ingredients: **banana liqueur**, **pineapple juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 37.5ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **banana liqueur**, 75ml of **pineapple juice**, 10ml of **cranberry juice**, 60ml of **grapefruit juice**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **grapefruit**.

cocktails.name: Casino
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic **gin** sour with maraschino and **orange bitters**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **orange bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **old tom gin**, 10ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 10ml of **lemon juice**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **lemon** and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Champagne Cocktail
cocktails.description: Profile: A celebratory sparkling cocktail with a **bitters**-soaked **sugar** cube and a splash of **Cognac**. Key ingredients: **bitters**, **sugar**, **Cognac**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 1 cube of **sugar**, 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**, 10ml of **Cognac**, 90ml of **Champagne**, and 3 drops of **Grand Marnier** to a **Champagne** flute.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Champs Elysees
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright **brandy** sour balancing **Cognac**, **green Chartreuse**, **lemon** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **Cognac**, **green Chartreuse**, **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac**, 15ml of **green Chartreuse**, 20ml of **lemon juice**, 10ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **lemon**.

cocktails.name: Charlie Chaplin
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward **brandy** cocktail showcasing **apricot brandy**, **sloe gin**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with **lime**. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **apricot brandy**, **sloe gin**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **apricot brandy**, 30ml of **sloe gin**, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **water**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a peel of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Chartreuse Swizzle
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical swizzle of **green Chartreuse**, **pineapple**, **lime**, and **falernum**, finished with **mint** and **nutmeg**. Key ingredients: **green Chartreuse**, **pineapple**, **lime**, **falernum**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 45ml of **green Chartreuse**, 30ml of **pineapple juice**, 25.5ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **falernum** to a tiki glass over **ice**.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with 3 **mint** leaves and a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Cherry Alexander
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy **vodka** drink featuring **vodka vanilla**, **Cherry Heering**, **Crème de Cacao White**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **vodka vanilla**, **Cherry Heering**, **Crème de Cacao White**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of **vodka vanilla**, 15ml of **Cherry Heering**, 15ml of **Crème de Cacao White**, 30ml of **cream**, and an of **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Chilcano de Pisco
cocktails.description: Profile: A long, sparkling **brandy** drink built for easy sipping, pairing **Pisco**, **Angostura Bitters**, **ginger ale** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **Pisco**, **Angostura Bitters**, **ginger ale**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Pisco**, 15ml of **lime juice**, 3 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**, and 100ml of **ginger ale**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** slice.

cocktails.name: Chocolate Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward **vodka** cocktail showcasing **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **espresso**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **espresso**, **chocolate syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Dip the rim of a Martini glass into **chocolate syrup**, then into **cocoa powder** or **chocolate** shavings.
2. Swirl **chocolate syrup** around the inside of the glass and place it in the freezer for 5-10 minutes.
3. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
4. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **coffee liqueur**, 45ml of **espresso**, and 30ml of **Crème de Cacao White**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into the chilled Martini glass.
7. Garnish with 3 **coffee beans**.

cocktails.name: Chocolate Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: An indulgent and velvety dessert cocktail that combines premium **vodka** with the deep, rich notes of **chocolate** for a luxurious treat. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **chocolate**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Dip the rim of a Martini glass into **chocolate syrup**, then into **cocoa powder** or **chocolate** shavings.
2. Swirl **chocolate syrup** around the inside of the glass and place it in the freezer for 5-10 minutes.
3. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
4. Add 45ml of **vodka** and 45ml of **Crème de Cacao Brown**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
7. Garnish with a shaving of **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Chocolate Negroni
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich twist on the classic Negroni, keeping its bittersweet aperitif profile while adding white cacao and **chocolate bitters**. Key ingredients: **chocolate bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 22.5ml of **Punt e Mes**, 22.5ml of **strucchi bitter**, 7.5ml of **Crème de Cacao White**, and 3 dashes of **chocolate bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** zest twist.

cocktails.name: Chocolate-Covered Cherry
cocktails.description: Profile: A layered shooter that uses different liqueur densities to create distinct, visible layers.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the **grenadine** into the glass first.
2. Gently pour the **coffee liqueur** over the back of a bar spoon to keep it separate.
3. Finish by layering the **Irish cream** on top using the same spoon technique.

cocktails.name: Christmas Velvet Alexander
cocktails.description: Profile: A luxurious festive delight that pairs the velvety texture of **egg liqueur** with the botanical bite of **gin** and the dry elegance of **fino sherry**. Key ingredients: **egg liqueur**, **gin**, **fino sherry**, **nutmeg**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the **egg liqueur**, **gin**, and **fino sherry** into a cocktail shaker filled with plenty of **ice**.
2. Shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until the mixture is well-chilled and develops a frothy consistency.
3. Double-strain the liquid into the chilled coupe glass to ensure a smooth texture.
4. Finish by grating fresh **nutmeg** over the top for a festive aroma.

cocktails.name: Clover Club
cocktails.description: Profile: A pre-prohibition **gin** sour colored with **raspberry syrup** and bound with **egg white**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **raspberry syrup**, **egg white**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **gin**, 15ml of **raspberry syrup**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **strawberry**.

cocktails.name: Cold Blooded
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated herbal twist on a fruit sour, blending the rich **orange** notes of **Grand Marnier** with tart cranberry and fresh **lemon**. Infused with. Key ingredients: **orange**, **Grand Marnier**, **lemon**, **rosemary**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place the first **rosemary** sprig and **lemon juice** into a cocktail shaker and muddle gently to release the aromatic oils.
2. Add the **Grand Marnier**, **cranberry juice**, and **rich simple syrup** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until well-chilled.
4. Double strain the mixture into a rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** to remove any **rosemary** bits.
5. Garnish with the remaining fresh sprig of **rosemary** and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Contessa
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold, spirit-forward **gin** drink built around **gin**, **dry vermouth**, **Aperol**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished. Key ingredients: **gin**, **dry vermouth**, **Aperol**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **dry vermouth**, and 30ml of **Aperol**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Copenhagen 1939
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright **gin** sour balancing **gin**, **red vermouth**, **cherry liqueur** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **gin**, **red vermouth**, **cherry liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, 30ml of **cherry liqueur**, 1 dash of **orange bitters**, 1 dash of **lemon**, and 1 dash of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.

cocktails.name: Cornwall Negroni
cocktails.description: Profile: A **gin**-forward variation of the classic Negroni, preserving its bittersweet vermouth-and-bitter structure with an extra lift from **orange bitters**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **orange bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, 15ml of **strucchi bitter**, 15ml of **red vermouth**, and 1 dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** zest twist.

cocktails.name: Corona Sunrise
cocktails.description: Profile: A vibrant and refreshing **beer** cocktail that puts a tropical twist on the classic Tequila sunrise. It perfectly blends the crispness of **Corona** with. Key ingredients: **beer**, **Corona**, **orange juice**, **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 330ml of **Corona**, 45ml of **Tequila blanco**, 45ml of **orange juice**, and 15ml of **grenadine** to a pub glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold, spirit-forward **brandy** drink built around **Cognac**, **Calvados**, **red vermouth**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **Cognac**, **Calvados**, **red vermouth**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Cognac**, 30ml of **Calvados**, and 30ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **orange**.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver #2
cocktails.description: Profile: A balanced mix of **gin**, citrus, and aromatics traditionally taken as a morning pick-me-up. Key ingredients: **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 1 dash of **absinthe**, 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Cointreau**, 30ml of **Lillet Blanc**, and 30ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **lemon**.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: Profile: A citrusy **vodka** cocktail with cranberry and **orange** notes. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **vodka citron**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 30ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **orange**.

cocktails.name: Creamsicle
cocktails.description: Profile: A luscious and velvety cocktail that perfectly captures the nostalgic flavor of an **orange** creamsicle. It balances the bright, citrusy notes of **vodka**. Key ingredients: **orange**, **vodka**, **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour **vodka**, **Grand Marnier**, **cream**, and **rich simple syrup**(if desired) into a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish with a fresh **orange** slice or zest.

cocktails.name: Creme Anglaise
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy **vodka** drink featuring **vodka**, **egg liqueur**, **cream**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **chocolate**. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **egg liqueur**, **cream**, **chocolate**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 60ml of **egg liqueur**, and 15ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick and nora glass.
5. Garnish with 2 pinches of **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Crimson King
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward **whiskey** cocktail that balances the spicy bite of rye with the complex bitterness of strucchi and the herbal depth of. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **Punt e Mes**, **cherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **rye whiskey**, 22.5ml of **strucchi bitter**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, 7.5ml of **Cherry Heering**, and 5ml of **Crème de Café**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
cocktails.description: Profile: A simple mix of rum, **cola**, and **lime** for a refreshing long drink. Key ingredients: **cola**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **white rum**, 10ml of **lime juice**, and 120ml of **cola**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Culto A La Vida
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright rum sour balancing **dark rum**, **sugar**, **lime** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with **lime. Key ingredients: **dark rum**, **sugar**, **lime**, **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **dark rum**, 1 teaspoon of **sugar**, 120ml of **cranberry juice**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic rum sour balancing **lime** and **sugar**. Key ingredients: **lime**, **sugar**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 20ml of **lime juice**, and 20ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Damn the Bloody Weather
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical **gin** cocktail with **gin**, **Orange Curaçao**, **red vermouth**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with. Key ingredients: **gin**, **Orange Curaçao**, **red vermouth**, **blood orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Orange Curaçao**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, 45ml of **blood orange** juice, and 1 dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **blood orange**.

cocktails.name: Dan Sabo's Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy **whiskey** drink featuring rye whisky, **lemon**, **egg white**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **maraschino cherry**. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **lemon**, **egg white**, **maraschino cherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **orange juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over an **ice** cube.
5. Garnish with 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters** and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Dandy
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold, spirit-forward **whiskey** drink built around whisky, **dubonnet**, **Cointreau**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **dubonnet**, **Cointreau**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **whiskey**, 45ml of **dubonnet**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, and 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n Stormy
cocktails.description: Profile: Spicy **ginger beer** topped with **dark rum** for a stormy refresher. Key ingredients: **ginger beer**, **dark rum**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Goslings Rum** and 100ml of **ginger beer**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Death & Taxes
cocktails.description: Profile: A complex **whiskey** cocktail where **Scotch Whisky**, **gin**, **Punt e Mes** meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **Scotch Whisky**, **gin**, **Punt e Mes**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Scotch Whisky**, 30ml of **gin**, 22.5ml of **Punt e Mes**, 7.5ml of **Benedictine**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Death In The Afternoon
cocktails.description: Profile: A spirit-forward wine cocktail showcasing **absinthe**, **sparkling wine**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Key ingredients: **absinthe**, **sparkling wine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 30ml of **absinthe**, 10ml of **simple syrup**, and 100ml of **sparkling wine** to a **Champagne** flute.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Delta Sunset
cocktails.description: Profile: Delta sunset is a glorious, quite strong cocktail. Stirred with 30ml **orange liqueur** **Cointreau** and 30ml **orange liqueur** continental with 30ml. Key ingredients: **orange liqueur**, **Cointreau**, **lemon juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Cointreau**, 30ml of **orange liqueur**, and 30ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Derby Popular
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold, spirit-forward **whiskey** drink built around **bourbon**, **Benedictine**, **Angostura Bitters**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **bourbon**, **Benedictine**, **Angostura Bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **bourbon**, 10ml of **Benedictine**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Desert Island
