cocktails.description: Profile: A long, sparkling liqueur drink built for easy sipping, pairing **coconut liqueur**, **cola** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Garnished with **lime**. Key ingredients: **coconut liqueur**, **cola**, **ice**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **coconut liqueur** and 150ml of **cola**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** slice and a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Devil's Margarita
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright agave spirit sour balancing **Tequila blanco**, **red wine** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with. Key ingredients: **Tequila blanco**, **red wine**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake first 3 ingredients with **ice** and fine-strain into a chilled glass.
2. Carefully float the wine.

cocktails.name: Dirty Banana
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy rum drink featuring **aged rum**, **coffee liqueur**, **banana liqueur**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **banana**. Key ingredients: **aged rum**, **coffee liqueur**, **banana liqueur**, **banana**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients with crushed **ice**.
2. Pour into a chilled glass optionally garnished with **chocolate syrup**.
3. Garnish with a **banana** slice on the rim.

cocktails.name: Dirty Girl Scout
cocktails.description: Profile: A sweet and moderate cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 servings:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **coffee liqueur**, 45ml of **Baileys**, and 45ml of **Crème de Menthe White**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 shooters.
5. Garnish every glass with a pinch of **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Dirty Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: An IBA official variation of the Martini drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 10ml of **dry vermouth**, and 10ml of **olive brine**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with 3 olives.

cocktails.name: Dirty Shirley
cocktails.description: Profile: A long, sparkling **vodka** drink built for easy sipping, pairing **vodka**, **grenadine**, **lime** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Garnished with. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **grenadine**, **lime**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **grenadine**, and 120ml of **lemon-lime soda**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Don's Special Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Profile: A tiki-style Daiquiri with **grapefruit** and **honey** notes. Key ingredients: **grapefruit**, **honey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gold Jamaican Rum**, 15ml of **cuban rum**, 15ml of **passion fruit syrup**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **honey syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled tiki glass.
5. Garnish with a half of **passion fruit**.

cocktails.name: Doralto
cocktails.description: Profile: A long, sparkling agave spirit drink built for easy sipping, pairing **Tequila blanco**, **Angostura Bitters**, **tonic** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Key ingredients: **Tequila blanco**, **Angostura Bitters**, **tonic**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila blanco**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 100ml of **tonic**.
6. Garnish with a **lime** slice.

cocktails.name: Dry Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: A timeless mix of **gin** and **dry vermouth** served icy cold. Key ingredients: **gin**, **dry vermouth**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 10ml of **dry vermouth**, and 1 dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with an **olive** and a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Dubonnet Cocktail
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and spirit-forward classic cocktail that perfectly balances the herbal complexity of **gin** with the rich, wine-based aromatics of. Key ingredients: **gin**, **dubonnet**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin** and 60ml of **dubonnet**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Eastern Promise
cocktails.description: Profile: An elegant and aromatic **vodka**-based sour that marries the floral notes of rose with the lush sweetness of apricot. This cocktail offers a sophisticated. Key ingredients: **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the **vodka**, **apricot brandy**, **rose syrup**, and fresh **lemon juice** into a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
4. Double-strain into the chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a dried rose bud or a **lemon** twist if desired.

cocktails.name: Eastside
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright **gin** sour balancing **gin**, **mint**, **cucumber** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **gin**, **mint**, **cucumber**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place the **cucumber** slices and **simple syrup** in a cocktail shaker. Muddle thoroughly to extract the juice.
2. Drop in the **mint** leaves and muddle gently.
3. Add the **gin** and **lime juice**. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 10–15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain into a chilled coupe or Martini glass.
6. Garnish with a thin **cucumber** wheel on the surface or a fresh **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: El Diablo
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic highball that perfectly balances the earthy notes of Tequila with the tart sweetness of blackcurrant liqueur and the spicy kick of **ginger. Key ingredients: **ginger beer**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice** cubes.
2. Add the Tequila, **Crème de Cassis**, and fresh **lime juice** to the shaker.
3. Shake well until the mixture is chilled.
4. Strain the mixture into a collins glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Top up with **ginger beer** and stir gently to combine.
6. Garnish with a **lime** wedge or wheel.

cocktails.name: El Presidente
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and sleek cuban classic that balances the crispness of **white rum** with the herbal notes of **dry vermouth** and the bright citrus of. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **dry vermouth**, **Orange Curaçao**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **dry vermouth**, 15ml of **Orange Curaçao**, and 10ml of **grenadine**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Electric Lemonade
cocktails.description: Profile: There are a few variations and substitutions you can play around with. You could replace **lemon-lime soda** with club soda or **tonic** **water** for a. Key ingredients: **lemon-lime soda**, **tonic**, **water**, **lemonade**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine **vodka**, blue curacao, **lemon juice**, and **simple syrup** in a cocktail shaker along with **ice**.
2. Give it a good shake. 
3. Fill a high ball or collins glass with **ice**, then strain in the cocktail.
4. Top it off with **lemon-lime soda**.
5. Stir gently to combine.
6. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Emerald Banana
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and vibrant cocktail that balances the smooth warmth of **Irish whiskey** with the exotic, tropical notes of green **banana liqueur**. Key ingredients: **Irish whiskey**, **banana liqueur**, **Amaro Montenegro**, **whiskey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Irish whiskey**, 20ml of **Pisang Ambon**, and 20ml of **Amaro Montenegro**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Emerson
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright **gin** sour balancing **old tom gin**, **red vermouth**, maraschino liqueur with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **gin**, **old tom gin**, **red vermouth**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **old tom gin**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 10ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: End of the Road
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold, spirit-forward liqueur drink built around **Laphroaig**, **Campari**, **green Chartreuse**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Key ingredients: **Laphroaig**, **Campari**, **green Chartreuse**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Laphroaig**, 30ml of **Campari**, and 30ml of **green Chartreuse**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: English Channel
cocktails.description: Profile: English channel is a refined, slow-sipping cocktail that combines herbal liqueurs with the British staple of **earl grey tea**. Key ingredients: **earl grey tea**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 22.5ml of **Grand Marnier**, 22.5ml of **Benedictine**, and 60ml of **earl grey tea**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Eskimo Slugger
cocktails.description: Profile: A potent and refreshing dessert cocktail that strikes a perfect balance between the creamy sweetness of **Irish cream**, the purity of **vodka**, and the. Key ingredients: **Irish cream**, **vodka**, **Rumple Minze**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. In a cocktail shaker half-filled with **ice** cubes, combine **Irish cream**, **vodka**, and peppermint liqueur.
2. Shake the mixture vigorously until it is well-chilled.
3. Strain into a rocks glass.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: A smooth **vodka** Martini energized with **espresso** and **coffee liqueur**. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **espresso**, **coffee liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **Kahlua**, 30ml of **espresso**, and 10ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with 3 **coffee beans**.

cocktails.name: Fergroni
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward twist on the classic Negroni. This cocktail elegantly balances the botanical notes of **gin** with the dark, bittersweet. Key ingredients: **gin**, **Punt e Mes**, **strucchi bitter**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Punt e Mes**, 20ml of **strucchi bitter**, and 1 **lemon** peel.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktails.name: Fernandito
cocktails.description: Profile: Argentina's favorite mix of fernet and **cola** over **ice**. Key ingredients: **cola**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Fernet Branca** and 120ml of **cola**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Final Ward
cocktails.description: Profile: Perhaps the most famous variation of the classic "Last Word" cocktail created by Phil Ward, with **rye whiskey** instead of **gin** and **lemon juice**. Key ingredients: **rye whiskey**, **gin**, **lemon juice**, **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine 20ml of rye whisky, 20ml of **green Chartreuse**, 20ml of maraschino liqueur and 20ml of **lemon juice** in a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
3. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Fireball
cocktails.description: Profile: This recipe is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice** cubes.
2. Pour 75ml of **white rum**, 75ml of **Goldschläger** (**cinnamon** schnapps) and 3 dashes of **Tabasco**.
3. Shake well and strain into shots.

cocktails.name: First Word
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright **gin** sour balancing **gin**, maraschino liqueur, **dry vermouth** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **gin**, **dry vermouth**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **gin**, 25ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 25ml of **dry vermouth**, 15ml of **Aperol**, and 25ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry** and a peel of **orange**.

cocktails.name: Flaming Dr Pepper
cocktails.description: Profile: Although dr pepper is not one of ingredients of this cocktail, it is claimed that it tastes like dr pepper.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a pint glass halfway with **beer**.
2. Add the **amaretto** to a shot glass and top with the rum.
3. Set the rum on fire and very carefully drop the shot glass into the **beer**.

cocktails.name: Flaming Volcano
cocktails.description: Profile: Flaming volcano is a large tropical group cocktail typically made with rum, **brandy**, **pineapple juice**, **orange juice**, and orgeat syrup. A flaming. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **pineapple juice**, **orange juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Get some crushed **ice** into a bowl.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **brandy** and 30ml of **dark rum**.
3. Add 60ml of **orange juice**, 60ml of **pineapple juice**, 30ml of **lemon juice** and 60ml of almond syrup.
4. Blend well and pour into a volcano bowl.

cocktails.name: Flatliner
cocktails.description: Profile: A strong and really invigorating shot.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **sambuca** into a shooter.
2. Carefully pour 25ml of Tequila on top of the **sambuca**.
3. Add a dash of **Tabasco**.

cocktails.name: Flip #27
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and velvety dessert cocktail that masterfully blends the richness of **port** with the deep notes of **aged rum**. The addition of. Key ingredients: **port**, **aged rum**, **raspberry syrup**, **heavy cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine **port**, **aged rum**, **raspberry syrup**, **heavy cream**, and the **egg** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Perform a 'dry shake' (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** to the shaker and shake again firmly until well-chilled.
4. Double strain the mixture into a chilled goblet glass to ensure a smooth texture.
5. Garnish with fresh raspberries on top.

cocktails.name: Fluffy Duck Classic
cocktails.description: Profile: Light, creamy and easy drinking. **Gin** prevents this particular duck from being too fluffy. Key ingredients: **Gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the **gin**, **advocaat**, **orange liqueur**, and **orange juice** to a cocktail shaker filled with **ice**.
2. Shake vigorously until well-chilled (about 15–30 seconds).
3. Strain into a tall glass filled with fresh **ice**.
4. Top with chilled **soda water** and stir gently.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Fluffy Duck Modern
cocktails.description: Profile: A stronger version of the cocktail. If you want something smoother, check out the 'fluffy duck 2'.
cocktails.instructions:
1. In a cocktail shaker, add **ice**, **advocaat**, **cream**, **Cointreau** or **triple sec** and **white rum**.
2. Shake well until combined.
3. Strain into an **ice**-filled glass.
4. Top with cold **lemonade**.
5. Garnish with a **strawberry**.

cocktails.name: Fort Point
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward riff on the Manhattan. This cocktail combines the spicy bite of rye whisky with the bitter-sweet complexity of **Punt e. Key ingredients: **Punt e Mes**, **honey**, **Benedictine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, and 7.5ml of **Benedictine**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.description: Profile: Crisp **gin** and **lemon** topped with sparkling **Champagne**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **lemon**, **Champagne**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled **Champagne** flute glass.
5. Top with 60ml of **Champagne**.
6. Garnish with a twist of **lemon**.

cocktails.name: French Connection
cocktails.description: Profile: Equal-parts blend of **Cognac** and **amaretto** served over **ice**. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **amaretto**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac** and 45ml of **amaretto**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: French Dew Sour
cocktails.description: Profile: An elegant and sophisticated twist on the classic sour, the French dew sour combines the deep, oaky notes of **Cognac** with the herbal complexity of. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **Benedictine**, **rosemary**, **black pepper**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Lightly muddle the fresh **rosemary** and **black pepper** in the bottom of a cocktail shaker.
2. Add the **Cognac**, **Benedictine**, **lemon juice**, **rich simple syrup**, **egg white**, **Angostura Bitters**, and **vanilla extract** to the shaker.
3. Perform a 'dry shake' (without **ice**) for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg white** and create a thick foam.
4. Add plenty of **ice** to the shaker and shake vigorously until well-chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a chilled rocks glass over a large **ice** cube.
6. Garnish with a fresh **rosemary** sprig and an extra crack of **black pepper** if desired.

cocktails.name: French Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: **Vodka** shaken with **raspberry liqueur** and **pineapple juice**. Key ingredients: **Vodka**, **raspberry liqueur**, **pineapple juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **raspberry liqueur**, and 15ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** peel and a **raspberry**.

cocktails.name: French Pearl
cocktails.description: Profile: Created by Audrey Saunders, this modern classic is a sophisticated **gin** sour that bridges the gap between a southside and a **pastis**-heavy aperitif. Key ingredients: **gin**, **pastis**, **anise**, **mint**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Gently muddle the fresh **mint** leaves with the **rich simple syrup** in a cocktail shaker to release the essential oils.
2. Add the **gin**, **pastis**, and fresh **lime juice** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until well-chilled.
4. Double strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a chilled coupe glass to remove **mint** fragments.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wheel and a fresh **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Fresh Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Profile: A vibrant and sophisticated twist on the classic Daiquiri. This cocktail combines the lush sweetness of muddled strawberries with crisp **white rum** and. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **lime**, **black pepper**, **salt**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place 7 fresh strawberries into a shaker and muddle thoroughly to release their juices.
2. Add the **white rum**, fresh **lime juice**, **rich simple syrup**, **black pepper**, and **salt** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until well-chilled.
4. Double strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a chilled coupe glass to remove **strawberry** seeds and pulp.
5. Garnish with a fresh **strawberry** on the rim.

cocktails.name: Frost Bite
cocktails.description: Profile: This cocktail features a striking blue color from **Blue Curaçao** layered with creamy sweetness. Key ingredients: **Blue Curaçao**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. In a cocktail shaker, pour the Tequila, **Blue Curaçao**, crème de cacao, and **cream**. Fill with **ice**.
2. Shake well until chilled.
3. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh **ice**.
4. Garnish with a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Frozen Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Profile: A variation of the popular Daiquiri cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **aged rum**, **lime juice**, **rich simple syrup**, and **Luxardo Maraschino** to a blender and blend briefly without **ice** on a slow setting.
2. Add about 150 g of crushed **ice** and blend again until smooth.
3. Pour into a chilled glass.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge on the rim, skewered with a **maraschino cherry**.
5. Serve with a straw.

cocktails.name: Frozen Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Profile: A frozen-style cocktail for sharing, blending fresh strawberries, citrus, and light rum into a balanced, fruit-forward drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place the frozen strawberries and **sugar** into a high-speed blender.
2. Pour in the **white rum**, **lemon juice**, and **lime juice**.
3. Add the **ice** to the blender container.
4. Blend on high speed until the mixture reaches a smooth, slushy consistency.
5. Pour the punch into a chilled glasses.
6. Garnish each glass with a fresh **strawberry**.

cocktails.name: Fuzzy Navel
cocktails.description: Profile: The fuzzy navel is a classic 1980s cocktail that combines the fruity sweetness of **peach** with the citrus tang of **orange**. It is one of the simplest. Key ingredients: **peach**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **peach schnapps** and 90ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge and a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Galliano Hotshot
cocktails.description: Profile: A layered shot with **Galliano**, coffee and **cream**. Key ingredients: **Galliano**, **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **Galliano** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully add 20ml of **espresso** and 10ml of **cream** on top of the **Galliano**.

cocktails.name: Garibaldi
cocktails.description: Profile: Italian mix of bitter **Campari** and fresh **orange juice**. Key ingredients: **Campari**, **orange juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Campari** and 120ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge.

cocktails.name: Gem
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated tropical delight that balances the depth of **aged rum** and **Cognac** with the bright acidity of **lime** and the lush sweetness of. Key ingredients: **aged rum**, **Cognac**, **lime**, **pineapple**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the **aged rum**, **Cognac**, **lime juice**, **pineapple syrup**, **rich simple syrup**, and **bitters** into a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until well chilled.
3. Double-strain into the chilled glass to ensure a smooth texture.
4. Garnish with an **orange** twist or slice.

cocktails.name: Genever Fruit Cup
cocktails.description: Profile: A refreshing and bubbly long drink that showcases the malty notes of **oude genever** paired with citrusy curaçao and herbal **red vermouth**. Topped with. Key ingredients: **oude genever**, **red vermouth**, **ginger ale**, **cola**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 25ml of **oude genever**, 15ml of **Orange Curaçao**, 25ml of **red vermouth**, 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**, 50ml of **ginger ale**, and 50ml of **cola** to a collins glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with an **orange** slice, a **lemon** slice, 4 **strawberry** slices, a **mint** sprig, and a **borage** sprig.

cocktails.name: Gibson
cocktails.description: Profile: A strong **gin** Martini garnished with a silverskin onion. Key ingredients: **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin** and 30ml of **dry vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with 3 silver onions.

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic **gin**-based cocktail with a long history. Key ingredients: **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin & Sin
cocktails.description: Profile: This cocktail's name speaks for itself. Bright, strong and good for adventure. It may be prepared as a shot.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice** cubes.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 30ml of **orange juice** and a dash of **grenadine**.
3. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Gin & Tonic
cocktails.description: Profile: A timeless and refreshing highball cocktail that perfectly balances the botanical notes of **gin** with the crisp bitterness of **tonic** **water**. This. Key ingredients: **gin**, **tonic**, **water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 60ml of **gin** and 120ml of **tonic** to a highball glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin Basil Smash
cocktails.description: Profile: Herbal **gin** sour brightened with fresh **basil**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **basil**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **basil** and **rich simple syrup** in a shaker.
2. Add **gin**, **lemon juice**, and **ice**.
3. Shake well.
4. Strain into a rocks glass over **ice**.
5. Garnish with a **basil** leaf.

cocktails.name: Gin Fizz
cocktails.description: Profile: Classic **gin** sour lengthened with **soda water**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **soda water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 1 **egg white**.
2. Dry shake for about 20 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
6. Top with 60ml of soda.
7. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Gin Rickey
cocktails.description: Profile: This classic cocktail is considered the best of the 'rickey' group of drinks, which are made from a base spirit, **lime juice** and soda. Key ingredients: **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 100ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin Sour
cocktails.description: Profile: The **gin** sour is a classic 'sour' cocktail. It can be served in a cocktail glass or a rocks glass. Key ingredients: **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine 60ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **sugar** syrup and an optional **egg white** into a cocktail shaker.
2. Add **ice**, shake again, and strain into a cocktail glass or a rocks glass with **ice**.
3. Garnish with either a **lemon** slice and **maraschino cherry** or with several drops of **Angostura Bitters**.

cocktails.name: Gladiator
cocktails.description: Profile: The gladiator cocktail is a drop shot like the Irish slammer. You pour the liqueurs into a shot glass, drop that glass into a larger glass filled with the.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 15ml of **amaretto**, 15ml of **peach schnapps**, 60ml of **7-Up**, and 60ml of **orange juice** to a pub glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Godfather
cocktails.description: Profile: A good mix of **Scotch Whisky** and **amaretto**, this rich-flavoured cocktail is an IBA official cocktail. Key ingredients: **Scotch Whisky**, **amaretto**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Scotch Whisky**, 20ml of **amaretto**, and 2 dashes of **bitters**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** peel.

cocktails.name: Godmother
cocktails.description: Profile: This IBA official cocktail is a softer variation of another classic cocktail – godfather.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **vodka**, 20ml of **amaretto**, and 2 dashes of **bitters**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** peel.

cocktails.name: Gold Rush
cocktails.description: Profile: A variation of the "**whiskey** sour" with **honey** instead of **sugar** syrup. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **honey**, **sugar**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine 60ml of **bourbon**, 20ml of **lemon juice** and 20ml of **honey syrup**(3:1) with **ice** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass filled with **ice**.
3. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge or a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Golden Cadillac
cocktails.description: Profile: The golden cadillac is a sweet, creamy, retro dessert cocktail. Created in 1952 at poor red's in el dorado, california, it became popular in the 1960s for. Key ingredients: **vanilla**, **brandy**, **Galliano**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice** cubes.
2. Add 20ml of **Galliano**, 20ml of crème de cacao white and 20ml of **cream**.
3. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Golden Dream
cocktails.description: Profile: An IBA official cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice** cubes.
2. Add 20ml of **Galliano**, 20ml of **triple sec**, 20ml of **orange juice**, and 10ml of **cream**.
3. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Grand Margarita
cocktails.description: Profile: Premium take on the classic Margarita with Tequila and **Grand Marnier**. Key ingredients: **Grand Marnier**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Rim a Margarita glass with **salt**.
2. Shake Tequila, **Grand Marnier**, **lime juice**, and **agave syrup** with **ice**.
3. Strain into the prepared glass.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wheel.

cocktails.name: Grasshopper
cocktails.description: Profile: Creamy after-dinner mix of **mint** and **chocolate** liqueurs. Key ingredients: **mint**, **chocolate**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients into a shaker with **ice**.
2. Shake well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Greek Tragedy
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and vibrant wine-based sour that masterfully balances the herbal notes of **Ouzo** with the botanical depth of **red vermouth**. The. Key ingredients: **Ouzo**, **red vermouth**, **raspberry liqueur**, **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine the **Ouzo**, **red vermouth**, **raspberry liqueur**, and fresh **lime juice** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with 150g of **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
4. Double strain into the glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry** and a **lime** twist to serve.

cocktails.name: Green Mexican
cocktails.description: Profile: The "green Mexican" is a vibrant, sweet-and-sour layered shot. It features a distinct three-tier appearance when prepared correctly.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Bottom layer: pour the green **banana liqueur** into a shot glass first.
2. Middle layer: carefully pour the **lemon juice** over the back of a bar spoon to layer it on top of the liqueur.
3. Top layer: gently layer the silver Tequila as the final top tier using the same bar spoon method.

cocktails.name: Green Tea
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and aromatic **vodka** cocktail that blends the herbal notes of bison grass **vodka** with the tropical sweetness of **Pisang Ambon** and a. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **Pisang Ambon**, **mint**, **apple juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the bison grass **vodka**, **Pisang Ambon**, **Crème de Menthe White**, and **apple juice** into a mixing glass or shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with 150g of **ice**.
3. Shake well for about 10-15 seconds.
4. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a fresh **banana** slice or peel to enhance the tropical aroma.

cocktails.name: Green Vesper
cocktails.description: Profile: A popular variation of the "Vesper" cocktail invented by james bond in "casino royale". The original recipe has **Kina Lillet** instead of **absinthe**. Key ingredients: **Kina Lillet**, **absinthe**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 20ml of **vodka**, and 10ml of **absinthe**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Greyhound
cocktails.description: Profile: The greyhound is a softer variation of the "salty dog" without **salt**. As with the salty dog, **gin** is often substituted with **vodka**. Key ingredients: **salt**, **gin**, **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **gin** and 200ml of **grapefruit juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **grapefruit** wedge.

cocktails.name: H.S.L. Special
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright liqueur-based sour that masterfully balances the herbal complexity of **Amaro Montenegro** with the deep berry notes of **Crème de Mure**. The. Key ingredients: **Amaro Montenegro**, **Crème de Mure**, **lime**, **absinthe**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine **Amaro Montenegro**, **Crème de Mure**, **lime juice**, **rich simple syrup**, and a dash of **absinthe** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with plenty of **ice** and shake vigorously.
3. Strain into a rock glass over fresh **ice** cube.
4. Garnish with a fresh **blackberry** or a **lime** wheel.

cocktails.name: Hairy Navel
cocktails.description: Profile: This is a stronger variation of the "fuzzy navel" cocktail with **vodka**. Key ingredients: **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **peach schnapps**, 30ml of **vodka**, and 120ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Hanky Panky
cocktails.description: Profile: Classic **gin** and vermouth cocktail with a hint of fernet. Key ingredients: **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 45ml of **red vermouth**, and 7.5ml of **Fernet Branca**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe or Martini glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Harvard
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and aromatic twist on the classic Manhattan, swapping **whiskey** for **brandy**. This spirit-forward drink offers a rich, velvety texture. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **brandy**, **angelica root**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **brandy**, 15ml of **red vermouth**, 2 pinches of **angelica root**, and 5ml of **gomme syrup**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Harvest Negroni
cocktails.description: Profile: An autumnal riff on the classic Negroni, replacing **gin** with **Calvados** while keeping the bittersweet aperitif balance. Key ingredients: **gin**, **Calvados**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add all ingredients.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a fresh **apple** slice.

cocktails.name: Harvey Wallbanger
cocktails.description: Profile: This IBA official cocktail was invented in 1952 by famous three-time world champion mixologist donato "duke" antone.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 90ml of **orange juice**, and 15ml of **Galliano**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Hazelnut Alexander
cocktails.description: Profile: A nutty twist on the classic **brandy** alexander. This cocktail blends the deep notes of **Cognac** with rich **chocolate** and toasted hazelnut, rounded. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **Cognac**, **chocolate**, **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the **Cognac**, **Crème de Cacao**, **hazelnut liqueur**, and **cream** into a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with plenty of **ice** and shake vigorously.
3. Strain into the chilled coupe.
4. Add a dash of **Angostura Bitters** on top if desired.
5. Garnish by grating fresh **chocolate** over the surface.

cocktails.name: Hazelnut Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: An interesting Martini variation with **Frangelico** (**hazelnut liqueur**) and cacao liqueur. If you like it mild, some recipes also suggest adding about a. Key ingredients: **Frangelico**, **hazelnut liqueur**, **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare your Martini glasses before shaking up your Martinis by gently drizzling **chocolate syrup** into a Martini glass.
2. Combine 60ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **Frangelico** and 15ml of crème de cacao white in a shaker with **ice**.
3. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Hemingway Special
cocktails.description: Profile: A tart rum sour with **grapefruit** and maraschino liqueur. Key ingredients: **grapefruit**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 40ml of **grapefruit juice**, 15ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Highball
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic whisky highball is one of the oldest **Scotch**-based cocktails, made of just three winning elements: **Scotch Whisky**, soda, and **ice**. Key ingredients: **Scotch**, **Scotch Whisky**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Scotch Whisky** and 120ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Hiroshima
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy spirit drink featuring **sambuca**, **Baileys**, **absinthe**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Key ingredients: **sambuca**, **Baileys**, **absinthe**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **sambuca** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of **Baileys** and 15ml of **absinthe**.
3. Add several **grenadine** drops using a straw.

cocktails.name: Honey Badger
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and herbal twist on the classic **whiskey** sour. This cocktail marries the bold warmth of **bourbon** with the complex botanical notes of. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **bourbon**, **yellow Chartreuse**, **ginger**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Lightly muddle the fresh **rosemary** sprig in the bottom of a cocktail shaker to release its essential oils.
2. Add the **bourbon**, **yellow Chartreuse**, **ginger syrup**, **honey syrup**, **lemon juice**, and **lemon bitters** into the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until well-chilled.
4. Fine strain the mixture into a rocks glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a fresh **rosemary** sprig and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Horny Bull
cocktails.description: Profile: Similar to the screwdriver but with Tequila instead of **vodka**. Key ingredients: **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila blanco** and 100ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge.

cocktails.name: Horse's Neck
cocktails.description: Profile: **Cognac** highball sharpened with **ginger ale** and **bitters**. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **ginger ale**, **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac**, 120ml of **ginger ale**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** peel.

cocktails.name: Hot Buttered Rum
cocktails.description: Profile: A traditional hot winter drink. Some recipes suggest using warm cider instead of **water**. The **sugar** in the recipe can be substituted with **honey**. Key ingredients: **water**, **sugar**, **honey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 2 teaspoons of **butter**, 1 teaspoon of **sugar**, 1 dash of **cinnamon**, 1 dash of **nutmeg**, 50ml of **dark rum**, and 100ml of **water** to an Irish coffee glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with a **lemon** slice and a **cinnamon** stick.

cocktails.name: Hot Toddy
cocktails.description: Profile: A warming mix of **whiskey**, **honey**, **lemon** and hot **water**. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **honey**, **lemon**, **water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 1 teaspoon of **honey**, 45ml of **whiskey**, 1 quarter of **lemon**, and 100ml of **boiling water** to an Irish coffee glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with a **lemon** peel and 2 **cloves**.

cocktails.name: Hurricane
cocktails.description: Profile: The hurricane is an iconic tropical cocktail that is brilliantly refreshing on a hot summer day. It is a fun rum-filled drink that includes a captivating. Key ingredients: **passion fruit**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add **white rum**, **dark rum**, optional **overproof rum**, **passion fruit** puree, **orange juice**, **grenadine** and **simple syrup**.
3. Shake well and strain into a hurricane glass filled with **ice**.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: IBA Tiki
cocktails.description: Profile: Fruity tiki blend of rums, juices, and exotic syrups.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **dark rum**, 15ml of **amaretto**, 5ml of **Frangelico**, 5ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 15ml of **passion fruit syrup**, 90ml of **pineapple juice**, 30ml of **lime juice**, 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**, and 1 slice of **ginger**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled tiki glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple** and a **mint**.

cocktails.name: Illegal
cocktails.description: Profile: Smoky **mezcal** balanced with herbal Chartreuse and **lime**. Key ingredients: **mezcal**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of **mezcal**, 15ml of **overproof rum**, 15ml of **falernum**, 1 bar spoon of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 22.5ml of **lime juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup** and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Improved Scotch Sling
cocktails.description: Profile: Scotch-based take on the improved whisky cocktail with **honey** and maraschino. Key ingredients: **honey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Islay Scotch Whisky**, 22.5ml of **red vermouth**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 1 teaspoon of **honey syrup**, 1 teaspoon of **water**, 1 teaspoon of **Luxardo Maraschino**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Incredible Hulk
cocktails.description: Profile: A vibrant green mix of **Cognac** and **Hpnotiq** named after the comic book hero. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **Hpnotiq**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Cognac** and 50ml of **Hpnotiq**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Indian Paintbrush
cocktails.description: Profile: A **gin**-based cocktail that beautifully marries the botanical notes of **gin** with the earthy aroma of **rosemary** and the tart brightness of. Key ingredients: **gin**, **rosemary**, **grapefruit**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine the **gin**, **rosemary syrup**, **lime juice**, and **grapefruit juice** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with plenty of **ice** and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until well-chilled.
3. Double-strain the mixture through a fine-mesh strainer into the chilled glass.
4. Garnish with a fresh sprig of **rosemary** or a **grapefruit** twist if desired.

cocktails.name: Irish Alexander
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy dessert cocktail that offers a sophisticated twist on the classic **brandy** alexander. By combining smooth **Cognac** with velvety **Irish. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **Cognac**, **Irish cream**, **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the **Irish cream**, **Cognac**, and fresh **cream** into a cocktail shaker filled with **ice**.
2. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until the shaker is well-frosted.
3. Double strain the mixture into the chilled coupe glass.
4. Dust the top lightly with **cocoa powder** for garnish.

cocktails.name: Irish Coffee
cocktails.description: Profile: Warm blend of **Irish whiskey**, hot coffee, and **cream**. Key ingredients: **Irish whiskey**, **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **brown sugar** to a heatproof glass.
2. Pour in hot **espresso** and stir until dissolved.
3. Add Irish whisky and stir.
4. Float lightly **whipped cream** on top.

cocktails.name: Irish Flag
cocktails.description: Profile: Layered shot showing the green, white and **orange** of the Irish flag. Key ingredients: **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of green crème de menthe into a shooter.
2. Carefully layer 15ml of **Baileys** and 15ml of **Grand Marnier** on top.

cocktails.name: Irish Frog
cocktails.description: Profile: Simple layered shot with **melon liqueur** and **Irish cream**. Key ingredients: **melon liqueur**, **Irish cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 25ml of Midori into a shooter.
2. Carefully add 25ml of **Baileys** on top of the Midori.

cocktails.name: Irish Pie Toddy
cocktails.description: Profile: A delightful twist on the **whiskey** sour that evokes the flavors of a homemade **apple** pie. The warmth of **Irish whiskey** pairs perfectly with sweet. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **apple**, **Irish whiskey**, **vanilla**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the **whiskey**, **apple juice**, **vanilla syrup**, and **lemon juice** into a small saucepan or **milk** pitcher.
2. Stir over low heat until it is steaming and fragrant. Do not bring it to a boil, as this can scorch the juice and cause the alcohol to evaporate.
3. Pour into a warm glass.
4. Squeeze the **orange** zest over the top of the glass to release oils, then drop the peel in.
5. Add the **cinnamon** stick and **apple** slice.

cocktails.name: Irish Slammer
cocktails.description: Profile: The Irish Slammer (traditionally known by more controversial names like the "Irish Car Bomb") is a "bomb shot" cocktail consisting of **Irish whiskey**,. Key ingredients: **Irish whiskey**, **Irish cream**, **Irish stout**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the 360ml of **Guinness** into a pint glass and let the foam settle.
2. Pour 15ml of **Irish cream** into a shot glass first, then layer 15ml of **Irish whiskey** on top.
3. Drop the shot glass into the Guinness and drink immediately. If it sits too long, the cream will curdle due to the acidity of the beer.

cocktails.name: Islander
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail for those who appreciate complex herbal notes. This drink blends the botanical richness of **red vermouth** with. Key ingredients: **red vermouth**, **Scotch Whisky**, **anise**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add ingredients to a shaker with **ice**. 
2. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well-chilled.
3. Fine strain the liquid into the chilled coupe glass.
4. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Jack & Coke
cocktails.description: Profile: Simple and popular mix of jack daniel's and **cola**. Key ingredients: **cola**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Jack Daniels** and 150ml of **cola**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Jack Rose
cocktails.description: Profile: Early 20th Century classic of **apple brandy**, **lemon** and **grenadine**. Key ingredients: **apple brandy**, **lemon**, **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Calvados**, 22.5ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist or an **apple** slice.

cocktails.name: Jackie Welles
cocktails.description: Profile: The jackie welles is a signature cocktail from the video game cyberpunk 2077, famously ordered by the character jackie welles at the afterlife bar. In. Key ingredients: **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **lime juice**, 120ml of **ginger beer**, 1 splash of **grenadine**, and 1 wedge of **lime**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Jägerbomb
cocktails.description: Profile: A jägerbomb is a popular "bomb shot" cocktail consisting of a shot of **Jägermeister** dropped into a glass containing an energy drink, typically **Red Bull**. Key ingredients: **Jägermeister**, **Red Bull**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour roughly half a can (approx. 125ml) of chilled **Red Bull** into a large glass, such as a pint glass or highball.
2. Fill a standard shot glass with 45ml of chilled **Jägermeister**.
3. Drop the shot glass directly into the larger glass.
4. Drink immediately, typically in one go.

cocktails.name: Jagertee
cocktails.description: Profile: Jagertee (hunter's tea) is a traditional Austrian spiced, alcoholic punch, famous as an après-ski warmer made from a blend of inländer rum, **black tea**,. Key ingredients: **black tea**, **sugar**, **water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the tea, wine, rum, **brandy**, and juice to a pot.
2. Toss in the **cinnamon**, **cloves**, and citrus slices.
3. Simmer on low-medium heat for about 5 minutes. Do not let it boil.
4. Remove from heat, stir in **honey** or **sugar** to your preference, and strain before serving in a mug.

cocktails.name: Jam Roly Poly
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, sweet **gin** drink featuring a **raspberry** taste. Key ingredients: **gin**, **raspberry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **raspberry liqueur** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of **egg liqueur** on top of the liqueur.

cocktails.name: Japanese Slipper
cocktails.description: Profile: This popular cocktail was created in 1984 by jean-paul bourguignon at mietta's restaurant in melbourne.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Midori Melon Liqueur**, 45ml of **Cointreau**, and 45ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **honeydew melon** and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Jelly Bean
cocktails.description: Profile: Layered shooter with **grenadine**, **sambuca** and **Southern Comfort**. Key ingredients: **grenadine**, **sambuca**, **Southern Comfort**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of **grenadine** into a shooter.
2. Carefully add 15ml of **sambuca** and 15ml of **Southern Comfort** on top of the **grenadine**.

cocktails.name: Jellyfish
cocktails.description: Profile: A jellyfish shooter is a layered drink that uses differing liquid densities to create the visual of a jellyfish "swimming" in the glass. There are two.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of crème de cacao white into a shooter glass.
2. Gently add 15ml of **amaretto** on top.
3. Gently pour 15ml of **Baileys** on top of the **amaretto**.
4. Add a few drops of **grenadine**.

cocktails.name: John Collins
cocktails.description: Profile: Refreshing **gin** highball with **lemon**, **sugar**, and soda. Key ingredients: **gin**, **lemon**, **sugar**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and 60ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Johnny Silverhand
cocktails.description: Profile: A johnny silverhand is a fictional cocktail from the video game cyberpunk 2077 that has been adapted into several popular real-world recipes. It is. Key ingredients: **beer**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila añejo**, 1 bar spoon of **agave syrup**, 3 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**, and 30ml of **Corona**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** peel and a **chili pepper**.

cocktails.name: Jolly Rancher
cocktails.description: Profile: Named after the popular American candy brand.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **Midori Melon Liqueur**, and 90ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Jungle Bird
cocktails.description: Profile: Tiki favorite blending **dark rum**, **Campari**, and **pineapple**. Key ingredients: **dark rum**, **Campari**, **pineapple**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **blackstrap rum**, 20ml of **Campari**, 45ml of **pineapple juice**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **demerara sugar syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple**.

cocktails.name: Kamikaze
cocktails.description: Profile: This popular cocktail is a variation of the original kamikaze shooter.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **triple sec**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Kings County
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that balances the honeyed notes of highland **Scotch Whisky** with a touch of Islay smoke and herbal complexity. Key ingredients: **Scotch Whisky**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Scotch Highland Whisky**, 10ml of **Islay Scotch Whisky**, 10ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, and 10ml of **Punt e Mes**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Kir
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic French aperitif that elegantly combines the crispness of dry **white wine** with the sweet, dark fruit notes of blackcurrant liqueur. Key ingredients: **white wine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 10ml of **Crème de Cassis** and 90ml of **white wine** to a wine glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Kir Royal
cocktails.description: Profile: An upscale, effervescent version of the classic kir, replacing still wine with **Champagne** for a celebratory and luxurious experience. Key ingredients: **Champagne**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 90ml of **Champagne** and 10ml of **Crème de Cassis** to a **Champagne** flute.
2. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Ladykiller
cocktails.description: Profile: The very sweet and beautiful 1984 championship-winning cocktail created by Peter Roth from the Kronenhalle bar in Zürich.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, 15ml of **apricot brandy**, 60ml of **passion fruit juice**, and 60ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice, and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Larkwood
cocktails.description: Profile: The larkwood is a herbal "sour" cocktail created by bartender Jason Clapham of Clapham Cocktails. It is a modern riff on the classic Last Word, substituting. Key ingredients: **green Chartreuse**, **Becherovka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake all ingredients with **ice**.
2. Strain into a chilled glass.
3. Garnish with **lime** wheel.

cocktails.name: Last Word
cocktails.description: Profile: Equal-parts **gin**, Chartreuse, maraschino, and **lime**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 25ml of **gin**, 25ml of **green Chartreuse**, 25ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, and 25ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Lava Flow
cocktails.description: Profile: A lava flow is a visually striking hawaiian cocktail that combines a **strawberry** Daiquiri-style base with a creamy piña colada top. The signature "lava". Key ingredients: **strawberry**, **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine the rums and strawberries in a blender. Blend until smooth and a thick syrup forms.
2. Pour the **strawberry** mixture into a tall hurricane or highball glass.
3. Combine the **banana**, **pineapple juice**, **cream** of coconut, and **ice** in the blender. Blend on high until completely smooth and frothy.
4. Slowly and gently pour the white mixture into the centre of the glass over the **strawberry** base.
5. · Tip: if the **strawberry** mixture does not rise naturally, use a straw to gently pull it up the sides of the glass to create the marbled effect.
6. Finish with a **pineapple** wedge and a paper umbrella for a classic tropical look.

cocktails.name: Lemon Drop Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: An IBA official variation of the Martini drink that is served as an all-day cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **triple sec**, and 20ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass, rimmed with **sugar**.
5. Garnish with **lemon** peel.

cocktails.name: Light Word
cocktails.description: Profile: A complex **gin** cocktail where **gin**, **Campari**, **green Chartreuse** meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Key ingredients: **gin**, **Campari**, **green Chartreuse**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Campari**, 30ml of **green Chartreuse**, and 30ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Liquorice
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that highlights the botanical notes of **gin** balanced by the deep, **anise**-flavored complexity of **black. Key ingredients: **gin**, **anise**, **black sambuca**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 7.5ml of **black sambuca**, 5ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 1 stalk of **liquorice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Lisbon Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: A refined european twist on the classic Martini. The rich, fruity notes of **port** wine blend seamlessly with the crispness of **gin** and the delicate. Key ingredients: **port**, **gin**, **st. Germain**, **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **port**, 60ml of **gin**, 15ml of **st. Germain**, and 1 dash of **Bittermens Boston Bittahs**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** peel and a **chamomile flowers**.

cocktails.name: London Calling
cocktails.description: Profile: Created in 2002 in London's **Milk** & **Honey** bar by Chris Jepson for a magazine competition. A well-known variation is the "**banana** calling". Key ingredients: **Milk**, **Honey**, **banana**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 15ml of **fino sherry**, 10ml of **lemon juice**, 10ml of **simple syrup**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **grapefruit**.

cocktails.name: Long Beach Iced Tea
cocktails.description: Profile: A variation of the long island iced tea with **cranberry juice** instead of **cola**. Key ingredients: **cranberry juice**, **cola**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **gin**, 15ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **Tequila blanco**, 15ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **orange liqueur**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, and 60ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.description: Profile: Five-spirit sour lengthened with **cola**. Key ingredients: **cola**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **Tequila blanco**, 15ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, 25ml of **lemon juice**, and 30ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Top with a splash of **Coca-Cola**.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Longshoreman
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold, spirit-forward **whiskey** drink built around **Punt e Mes**, rye whisky, and **amaro**. It is bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **Punt e Mes**, **amaro**, **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, 45ml of **rye whiskey**, and 15ml of **amaro**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Love & Murder
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright and complex liqueur sour that balances the bitterness of **Campari** with the herbal notes of **green Chartreuse** and fresh **lime**. A crisp,. Key ingredients: **Campari**, **green Chartreuse**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Campari**, 30ml of **green Chartreuse**, 30ml of **lime juice**, 20ml of **simple syrup**, and 1 dash of **salt**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Lovelight
cocktails.description: Profile: An elegant and sophisticated **brandy**-based drink. It combines the warmth of **Cognac** with the spicy depth of **cinnamon** and **chocolate bitters**,. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **Cognac**, **cinnamon**, **chocolate bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **Cognac**, 20ml of **strucchi bitter**, 10ml of **red vermouth**, 5ml of **cinnamon syrup**, and 2 dashes of **chocolate bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist and a **chocolate** slice.

cocktails.name: Lucien Gaudin
cocktails.description: Profile: A cocktail named after lucien gaudin, a French fencer who won two gold medals in the 1924 and 1928 olympic games, named similarly to the Negroni, with the. Key ingredients: **orange liqueur**, **dry vermouth**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Cointreau**, 15ml of **Campari**, and 15ml of **dry vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Lynchburg Lemonade
cocktails.description: Profile: A popular cocktail named after lynchburg, tennessee, the hometown of the jack daniel's distillery.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Jack Daniels**, 15ml of **triple sec**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and 100ml of **lemonade**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.description: Profile: Rum-forward tiki classic with **Orange Curaçao**, **lime**, and orgeat. Key ingredients: **Orange Curaçao**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **dark rum**, 15ml of **Orange Curaçao**, 15ml of almond(orgeat) syrup, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 7.5ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a highball glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a sprig of **mint** and a slice of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Malibu Bay Breeze
cocktails.description: Profile: A simple, light and delicious cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Malibu Rum**, 60ml of **cranberry juice**, and 60ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **pineapple** slice.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: Profile: Spirit-forward mix of **bourbon**, **sweet vermouth**, and **bitters**. Key ingredients: **bourbon**, **sweet vermouth**, **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **bourbon**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Manhattan Dry
cocktails.description: Profile: A good pre-dinner cocktail that is a variation of the Manhattan with **dry vermouth**. Key ingredients: **dry vermouth**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **bourbon**, 20ml of **dry vermouth**, and 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Cuban Manhattan
cocktails.description: Profile: Also called perfect Manhattan, this is a combination of Manhattan and Manhattan dry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **dark rum**, 10ml of **dry vermouth**, 10ml of **red vermouth**, and 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.description: Profile: Classic Tequila sour balanced with **triple sec** and **lime**. Key ingredients: **triple sec**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila blanco**, 20ml of **triple sec**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 10ml of **agave syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Margarita glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **salt** and a wedge of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Maria McClaire
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold spirit-forward drink that harmoniously blends the richness of **port** with the warmth of **Irish whiskey** and the botanical bitterness of **Campari**. Key ingredients: **port**, **Irish whiskey**, **Campari**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **port**, 45ml of **Irish whiskey**, 15ml of **Campari**, and 1 dash of **creole bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Martinez
cocktails.description: Profile: A legendary pre-prohibition classic, often considered the father of the Martini, offering a perfect balance of sweet vermouth and botanical **gin**. Key ingredients: **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **gin**, **red vermouth**, **Luxardo Maraschino**, and **orange bitters** to a shaker with **ice**.
2. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well-chilled.
3. Strain into a cocktail glass.
4. Express the oils of a **lemon** twist over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Mary Pickford
cocktails.description: Profile: Tropical rum and **pineapple** cocktail sweetened with maraschino and **grenadine**. Key ingredients: **pineapple**, **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **white rum**, 45ml of **pineapple juice**, 7.5ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, and 5ml of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Maximilian Affair
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and bright agave spirit sour that masterfully balances the smokiness of **mezcal** with the floral notes of elderflower and the bitter-sweet. Key ingredients: **mezcal**, **Punt e Mes**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **mezcal**, 30ml of **elderflower cordial**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, and 7.5ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Meat Hook
cocktails.description: Profile: A robust, spirit-forward variation of a modern classic. This cocktail pairs the spice of rye with aromatic vermouth and a haunting hint of Islay smoke.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **rye whiskey**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, 10ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, and 5ml of **Islay Scotch Whisky**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Melon Ball
cocktails.description: Profile: A vibrant, fruit-forward highball with sweet melon notes and a refreshing finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 60ml of **Midori Melon Liqueur**, and 90ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a scoop of **honeydew melon**.

cocktails.name: Metropolis
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical and refreshing highball that blends the creamy sweetness of coconut with the crisp, tart notes of **apple juice**. Perfect for those who enjoy a. Key ingredients: **apple juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **coconut liqueur** and 150ml of **apple juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with 3 **apple** slices.

cocktails.name: Mexican Mule
cocktails.description: Profile: The Mexican mule — also known as el burro or the jalisco mule — is a bold variation on the **vodka** buck, substituting **vodka** with Tequila for an. Key ingredients: **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a copper mug with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila blanco**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 90ml of **ginger beer**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** slice.

cocktails.name: Miami Beach
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and dry cocktail that combines the smokiness of **Scotch Whisky** with the herbal notes of **dry vermouth** and the tartness of fresh. Key ingredients: **Scotch Whisky**, **dry vermouth**, **grapefruit juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 45ml of **pineapple juice**, and 7.5ml of **rich simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Michelada
cocktails.description: Profile: Legend has it that the michelada was invented in the Mexican City san luis potosí, either by general don augusto michel in the 1920s or by a bar regular. Key ingredients: **lime juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 355ml of **beer**, 30ml of **tomato juice**, 30ml of **lime juice**, 2 dashes of **Tabasco**, and 2 dashes of **worcestershire sauce**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **salt**, a pinch of **chili powder**, and a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Midori Illusion
cocktails.description: Profile: A sweet and fresh popular cocktail. Many varieties exist, such as stronger ones with less **pineapple juice** and those without **lemon juice** and **Blue. Key ingredients: **pineapple juice**, **lemon juice**, **Blue Curaçao**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Midori Melon Liqueur**, 15ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **triple sec**, 45ml of **pineapple juice**, and 30ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Top with **lemonade**.
6. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge.

cocktails.name: Midori Sour
cocktails.description: Profile: The Midori sour is a sweet and slightly sour cocktail with a delicious melon flavor.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Midori Melon Liqueur**, 30ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Top with 15ml of **soda water**.
6. Garnish with a peel of **lemon** and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Milano-Torino
cocktails.description: Profile: Also known as "Mi-To," this cocktail was created around 1860 in a cafe in Milan, Italy. It is named after the ingredients: **Campari** is from Milan, and. Key ingredients: **Campari**, **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Campari** and 30ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Mimosa
cocktails.description: Profile: Brunch favorite combining **sparkling wine** and fresh **orange juice**. Key ingredients: **sparkling wine**, **orange juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 75ml of **orange juice** and 75ml of **Champagne** to a **Champagne** flute.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Mind Eraser
cocktails.description: Profile: A long, sparkling **vodka** drink built for easy sipping, pairing **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **tonic** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **tonic**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **coffee liqueur**, and 30ml of **tonic**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Mini Snowball
cocktails.description: Profile: A festive and nostalgic favourite in the UK, this 'winter warmer' is sweet, fizzy, and pleasantly creamy.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shooter with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **egg liqueur**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 60ml of **lemonade**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.description: Profile: **Bourbon** refresher with muddled **mint** and **sugar** over crushed **ice**. Key ingredients: **Bourbon**, **mint**, **sugar**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **mint** leaves, **sugar**, and **water** in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
3. Add **bourbon** and stir until chilled.
4. Garnish with a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Missionary's Downfall
cocktails.description: Profile: Blended tiki mix of rum, **peach liqueur**, **pineapple**, **mint**, and **honey**. Key ingredients: **peach liqueur**, **pineapple**, **mint**, **honey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **white rum**, **peach brandy**, **lime juice**, **honey syrup**, **pineapple** pieces, **mint** leaves, and **ice** to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Pour into a highball glass.
4. Garnish with a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: Profile: Cuban highball with rum, **lime**, **mint**, **sugar**, and sparkling soda. Key ingredients: **lime**, **mint**, **sugar**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **mint** leaves and **sugar** with **lime juice** in a highball glass.
2. Add **white rum** and 120g of crushed **ice**, then stir briefly.
3. Top with **soda water** and gently stir.
4. Garnish with a **mint** sprig and **lime** slice.

cocktails.name: Mojito Pomegranate
cocktails.description: Profile: A pomegranate variation of mojito.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 4 sprigs of **mint** and 2 teaspoons of **sugar** in a highball glass.
2. Add 30ml of **lime juice** and stir gently.
3. Fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
4. Pour 45ml of **white rum** and 60ml of **pomegranate juice**, and top with 90ml of **soda water**.
5. Garnish with a sprig of **mint** leaves.

cocktails.name: Motox
cocktails.description: Profile: A refreshing and aromatic citrus-forward cocktail that balances the spicy kick of fresh **ginger** and **coriander** with the bright notes of **lemon**. Key ingredients: **ginger**, **coriander**, **lemon**, **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle the fresh **ginger** and **coriander** leaves in a shaker to release their aromatic oils.
2. Add the **vodka citron**, **limoncello**, **pineapple juice**, and **apple juice** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake vigorously until well-chilled.
4. Double strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass to remove small bits of **ginger** and herbs.
5. Garnish with a fresh sprig of **coriander**.

cocktails.name: Mrs Daisy Robinson
cocktails.description: Profile: An elegant and sparkling **Pisco**-based drink that offers a sophisticated blend of tropical **pineapple** and tart **grapefruit**, finished with the. Key ingredients: **Pisco**, **pineapple**, **grapefruit**, **Prosecco**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 25ml of **Pisco**, 15ml of **pineapple syrup**, 15ml of **grapefruit juice**, 5ml of **lime juice**, and 2 dashes of **creole bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled **Champagne** flute glass.
5. Top with 50ml of **Prosecco**.
6. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple**.

cocktails.name: Mudslide (frozen)
