cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy, and indulgent cocktail. This decadent mix of **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **Irish cream** and **heavy cream**. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **Irish cream**, **heavy cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a hurricane glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **coffee liqueur**, 30ml of **Irish cream**, and 2 scoops of **ice cream**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with 5 **chocolate syrup** ml and 2 shavings of **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Mudslide (shaken)
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy, and indulgent cocktail. This decadent mix of **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **Irish cream** and **heavy cream**. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **Irish cream**, **heavy cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **coffee liqueur**, 30ml of **Irish cream**, and 45ml of **heavy cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with 5ml of **chocolate syrup** and 2 shavings of **chocolate**.

cocktails.name: Mulled Wine
cocktails.description: Profile: Also called "glühwein" in German, this drink is very popular in German-speaking countries and france. Spices can be varied greatly – just use what you like.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Heat a bottle or more of **red wine** in a pan.
2. Add **cinnamon sticks**, **cloves**, **sugar**, **vanilla** pods, and **anise**.
3. Add **lemon** wedges, and wait10 minutes.
4. Heat until the wine almost boils, and serve in cups.

cocktails.name: Naked & Famous
cocktails.description: Profile: Equal parts **mezcal**, **Aperol**, **yellow Chartreuse**, and **lime** for a smoky, bittersweet sour. Key ingredients: **mezcal**, **Aperol**, **yellow Chartreuse**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 20ml of **mezcal**, 20ml of **yellow Chartreuse**, 20ml of **Aperol**, and 20ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Naked Lady
cocktails.description: Profile: A very interesting combination of gentle sweetness and a light touch of sour, resulting in a delicious, classic drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **white rum**, 50ml of **red vermouth**, 15ml of **apricot brandy**, 15ml of **grenadine**, and 15ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **lemon**.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.description: Profile: Classic Italian aperitif of **gin**, **bitters**, and sweet vermouth. Key ingredients: **gin**, **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Campari**, and 30ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Negroni Sbagliato
cocktails.description: Profile: A sparkling variation of the classic Negroni in which **Prosecco** replaces **gin**, creating a lighter and more refreshing aperitif. Key ingredients: **Prosecco**, **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Campari** and 30ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently to chill and combine.
4. Top with 40ml **Prosecco**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Neptune's Wrath
cocktails.description: Profile: The creation of this cocktail is credited to toby malone, who first prepared it for the violet hour in Chicago.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **gin**, 7.5ml of **absinthe**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, 22.5ml of **lemon juice**, 7.5ml of **green Chartreuse** and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: New York Sour
cocktails.description: Profile: **Whiskey** sour finished with a float of **red wine**. Key ingredients: **Whiskey**, **red wine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 60ml of **bourbon**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 20ml of **simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over an **ice** cube.
5. Float 15ml of **red wine** on top.
6. Garnish with a **lemon** twist and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Nutty Irishman
cocktails.description: Profile: A smooth, creamy classic that highlights the harmonious blend of hazelnut and **Irish cream**. Perfect for fans of dessert-style cocktails, it offers a rich. Key ingredients: **Irish cream**, **whiskey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice** cubes.
2. Add 30ml of **Frangelico**, 30ml of **Baileys**, and 30ml of **cream** to the shaker.
3. Shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until well-chilled.
4. Strain the mixture into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Optionally, top with a layer of loose **whipped cream**.
6. Garnish with a sprinkle of freshly grated **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Oatmeal Cookie
cocktails.description: Profile: This sweet and nostalgic shooter tastes remarkably like its namesake dessert. The combination of **cinnamon**, butterscotch, and **Irish cream** creates a. Key ingredients: **cinnamon**, **Irish cream**, **Jägermeister**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Goldschläger**, 30ml of **butterscotch liqueur**, 30ml of **Baileys**, and 30ml of **Jägermeister** (if using).
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.

cocktails.name: Old Cuban
cocktails.description: Profile: Sparkling mix of **aged rum**, **mint**, **lime**, and **Champagne**. Key ingredients: **aged rum**, **mint**, **lime**, **Champagne**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **mint** leaves with **simple syrup** in a shaker.
2. Add rum, **lime juice**, and **bitters** with **ice**.
3. Shake well.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail or coupe glass.
5. Top with **Champagne** and garnish with a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: Profile: Time-honored mix of **whiskey**, **sugar**, and **bitters**. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **sugar**, **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place **sugar** in a rocks glass and saturate with **bitters**.
2. Add a splash of **water** and muddle until dissolved.
3. Fill the glass with **ice** and add **bourbon**.
4. Stir gently.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Opal Café
cocktails.description: Profile: A velvety layered shooter that combines the bold, **anise**-flavored depth of **black sambuca** with rich **espresso** and a silky **cream** float. Key ingredients: **anise**, **black sambuca**, **espresso**, **cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the **black sambuca** into a chilled shooter glass.
2. Gently layer the **espresso** over the **sambuca** using the back of a bar spoon.
3. Carefully float the **cream** on top as the final layer.
4. Serve immediately to maintain the distinct layers.

cocktails.name: Orgasm
cocktails.description: Profile: A popular, indulgent dessert cocktail known for its sweet, creamy profile. This version features a potent mix of **orange** liqueurs and **Irish cream**. Key ingredients: **orange**, **Irish cream**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Cointreau**, 30ml of **Baileys**, and 20ml of **Grand Marnier**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Orgasm (shot)
cocktails.description: Profile: This orgasm shot is a layered delight with **coffee liqueur**, **Irish cream**, and **amaretto**. Key ingredients: **coffee liqueur**, **Irish cream**, **amaretto**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour **coffee liqueur** into the base of a shot glass.
2. Layer on **amaretto**
3. Top with a layer of **Irish cream**.

cocktails.name: Ouzi
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright **vodka** sour balancing **vodka**, **Ouzo**, **rich simple syrup** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **Ouzo**, **rich simple syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
For 3 servings:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 67.5ml of **vodka**, 45ml of **Ouzo**, 22.5ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 22.5ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Pacha Sao Paulo
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical rum cocktail with **mango**, **dark rum**, **coconut liqueur**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with **cherry**. Key ingredients: **mango**, **dark rum**, **coconut liqueur**, **cherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle the **mango** pieces in the bottom of a shaker or blender.
2. Add **dark rum**, **coconut liqueur**, **grenadine**, and **pineapple juice**.
3. Fill with **ice** and shake well (or blend briefly for a frozen texture).
4. Pour the contents into a hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with two cherries on top.

cocktails.name: Painkiller
cocktails.description: Profile: A signature drink of pusser's rum, first created in the 1970s by daphne henderson at the soggy dollar bar in the British virgin islands.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **dark rum**, 30ml of **coconut milk**, 90ml of **pineapple juice**, and 30ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Pale Charlie
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and aromatic long drink that balances the tartness of **sloe gin** and citrus with the depth of **apricot brandy** and a refreshing **ale**. Key ingredients: **sloe gin**, **apricot brandy**, **ale**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 22.5ml of **sloe gin**, 22.5ml of **apricot brandy**, 22.5ml of **grapefruit juice**, 22.5ml of **lime juice**, and 2 dashes of **absinthe**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a collins glass filled with **ice**.
5. Top up with 90ml of **ale**.

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.description: Profile: Mexico's favorite cocktail, featuring a perfect harmony of tart **grapefruit**, zesty **lime**, and premium Tequila for a refreshing citrus experience. Key ingredients: **grapefruit**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila blanco**, 15ml of **agave syrup**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 120ml of **grapefruit soda**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a pinch of **salt** and a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Panama
cocktails.description: Profile: A creamy and elegant dessert cocktail, this variation of the **brandy** alexander uses white crème de cacao for a lighter, more refined look. Key ingredients: **brandy**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Cognac**, 30ml of **Crème de Cacao White**, and 30ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Pantera Rosa
cocktails.description: Profile: The pantera rosa — meaning pink panther — was named for its vibrant pink color.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice** cubes.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 15ml of **limoncello**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup** and 2 raspberries.
3. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish with a float of fresh **mint**.

cocktails.name: Papaya Rum Punch
cocktails.description: Profile: A long, sparkling rum drink built for easy sipping, pairing **papaya juice**, **white rum**, **triple sec** with bubbly mixers over **ice**. Garnished with. Key ingredients: **papaya juice**, **white rum**, **triple sec**, **ice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **white rum**, 60ml of **papaya juice**, 30ml of **orange juice**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **papaya** slice.

cocktails.name: Papaya Smash
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright agave spirit sour balancing **papaya**, **agave syrup**, añejo Tequila with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **papaya**, **agave syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Tequila añejo**, 15ml of **Aperol**, 1 slice of **papaya**, 22.5ml of **agave syrup**, 22.5ml of **lime juice**, and 15ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake well for about 15 seconds until chilled.
4. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a **papaya** wedge.

cocktails.name: Paper Plane
cocktails.description: Profile: Modern equal-parts cocktail of **bourbon**, **Aperol**, **amaro**, and **lemon**. Key ingredients: **bourbon**, **Aperol**, **amaro**, **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **bourbon**, 30ml of **Aperol**, 30ml of **Amaro Nonino**, and 30ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Paradise
cocktails.description: Profile: Pre-prohibition blend of **gin**, **apricot brandy**, and **orange juice**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **apricot brandy**, **orange juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 20ml of **apricot brandy**, and 15ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Pedro Manhattan
cocktails.description: Profile: Pedro Manhattan is a variation on the classic Manhattan cocktail that replaces the traditional sweet vermouth with **Pedro Ximenez Sherry**. The Pedro. Key ingredients: **Pedro Ximenez Sherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **bourbon**, 20ml of **Pedro Ximenez Dherry**, 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**, and 2 dashes of **creole bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Penicillin
cocktails.description: Profile: Smoky **Scotch Whisky** cocktail with **honey**, **ginger**, and **lemon**. Key ingredients: **Scotch Whisky**, **honey**, **ginger**, **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle 3 pieces of fresh **ginger** in a top tin.
2. Add blended **Scotch Whisky**, **lemon juice**, and **honey syrup** into a shaker with **ice**.
3. Shake well.
4. Double strain into a rocks glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Float **Islay Scotch Whisky** on top and garnish with a **ginger candy**.

cocktails.name: Perfect Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: This is a combination of the dry and sweet Martini cocktails that makes a good pre-dinner cocktail. The amount of **gin** can be varied according to your taste. Key ingredients: **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 10ml of **dry vermouth**, and 10ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Pete's Word
cocktails.description: Profile: A smoky take on the Last Word with **Laphroaig**, maraschino liqueur and **green Chartreuse**. Key ingredients: **Laphroaig**, **green Chartreuse**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Laphroaig**, 30ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 30ml of **green Chartreuse**, and 30ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Piña Clara
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, lighter take on the classic tropical profile. This cocktail combines **white rum** with clear **coconut water** and **pineapple syrup** for. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **coconut water**, **pineapple syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **white rum**, 10ml of **pineapple syrup**, and 50ml of **coconut water**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled collins glass.
5. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge.

cocktails.name: Piña Colada
cocktails.description: Profile: The ultimate tropical indulgence. A creamy, sweet blend of **white rum**, **coconut cream**, and **pineapple juice** that transports you straight to a. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **coconut cream**, **pineapple juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **coconut syrup**, and 90ml of **pineapple juice** into a blender.
2. Add 5ml of **lime juice**(optional).
3. Add crushed **ice** and blend on high speed until smooth and slushy.
4. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Pink Lady
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic prohibition-era cocktail known for its beautiful rosy hue and silky texture. The combination of **gin**, **grenadine**, and **egg white** creates. Key ingredients: **gin**, **grenadine**, **egg white**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **gin**, 15ml of **strawberry syrup**, 15ml of **grenadine**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Pisco Punch
cocktails.description: Profile: Fruity highball of **Pisco** with **pineapple** and citrus. Key ingredients: **Pisco**, **pineapple**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Pisco**, 22.5ml of **pineapple juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 30ml of **white wine**, and 3 **cloves**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple**.

cocktails.name: Pisco Sour
cocktails.description: Profile: Peruvian classic with **Pisco**, **lime**, and creamy **egg white** foam. Key ingredients: **Pisco**, **lime**, **egg white**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of **Pisco**, 30ml of **lime juice**, 20ml of **simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with 3 drops of **Angostura Bitters**.

cocktails.name: Planter's Punch
cocktails.description: Profile: **Jamaican Rum** punch with citrus, **grenadine**, and a touch of **bitters**. Key ingredients: **Jamaican Rum**, **grenadine**, **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Jamaican Rum**, 15ml of **lime juice**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, 15ml of **orange juice**, 15ml of **pineapple juice**, and 15ml of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Top with soda.
6. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple**.

cocktails.name: Popinjay
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and spirit-forward cocktail that balances the warmth of **Cognac** with the herbal bitterness of **Cynar** and the botanical complexity of. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **Cynar**, **Punt e Mes**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 22.5ml of **Cognac**, 22.5ml of **Cynar**, 22.5ml of **Punt e Mes**, and 1 **orange** twist.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.

cocktails.name: Porn Star Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: An exotic and visually stunning modern classic, featuring vibrant **passion fruit** flavors and served with a celebratory Sidecar of **sparkling wine**. Key ingredients: **passion fruit**, **sparkling wine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **vodka vanilla**, 20ml of **passion fruit liqueur**, 15ml of **passion fruit syrup**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 10ml of **vanilla syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Serve with 60ml of **Champagne** on the side.
6. Garnish with a half of **passion fruit**.

cocktails.name: Porto Flip
cocktails.description: Profile: A velvety and decadent dessert cocktail that combines the richness of **port** wine and **Cognac** with a creamy texture from a fresh **egg yolk**. Key ingredients: **port**, **Cognac**, **egg yolk**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of **Cognac**, 45ml of **tawny port**, and an **egg yolk** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) first to emulsify the **egg yolk**.
3. Add **ice** to the shaker and shake vigorously again until well-chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or small goblet.
5. Dust the surface with a pinch of freshly grated **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Purgatory a la Française
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward twist on the classic purgatory. This French-inspired version balances the boldness of **Cognac** with the herbal sweetness. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **yellow Chartreuse**, **Punt e Mes**, **Islay Scotch Whisky**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **Cognac**, 10ml of **yellow Chartreuse**, 20ml of **Punt e Mes**, and 5ml of **Islay Scotch Whisky**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Rabo de Galo
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic brazilian staple that translates to 'tail of the rooster'. This drink is a complex, bittersweet harmony of **Cachaça** and herbal **amaro**,. Key ingredients: **Cachaça**, **amaro**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Cachaça**, 20ml of **red vermouth**, 15ml of **Cynar**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** twist.

cocktails.name: Rafaello
cocktails.description: Profile: Inspired by the famous confectionery, this cocktail is a decadent dessert in a glass. It combines the creaminess of **Irish cream** with tropical coconut. Key ingredients: **Irish cream**, **vanilla**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Rim a snifter glass with **coconut flakes** by lightly wetting the edge and dipping it into the flakes.
2. Combine **Irish cream**, **coconut liqueur**, and **vanilla syrup** in a shaker.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until very cold.
4. Double strain the mixture into the prepared snifter glass.
5. Sprinkle any remaining **coconut flakes** on top for an extra touch of texture.

cocktails.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
cocktails.description: Profile: A frothy **gin** fizz with citrus, **cream**, and a hint of **orange flower water**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **cream**, **orange flower water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **gin**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **lime juice**, 30ml of **simple syrup**, 3 dashes of **orange flower water**, 60ml of **cream**, 3 drops of **vanilla extract** and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled collins glass.
5. Top with 60ml of **soda water**.
6. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Rattlesnake
cocktails.description: Profile: A strong **whiskey**-based cocktail from the 1930s, first documented in **The Savoy Cocktail Book**. The original note says it is "so called because it will. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **The Savoy Cocktail Book**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 1 dash of **absinthe**, 2 teaspoons of **lemon juice**, 2 teaspoons of **simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg white**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **lemon**.

cocktails.name: Red Hook
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward riff on the Manhattan. This brooklyn-inspired cocktail balances the spicy kick of **rye whiskey** with the bittersweet. Key ingredients: **rye whiskey**, **Punt e Mes**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **rye whiskey**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, and 10ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with 2 maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Red Lebowski
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold and minimalist two-ingredient drink. The neutral profile of **vodka** allows the deep, sweet, and tart notes of **cherry brandy** to take center. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **cherry brandy**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka** and 30ml of **cherry brandy**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Redheaded Slut
cocktails.description: Profile: A layered shooter combining herbal **Jägermeister**, sweet **peach schnapps**, and tart **cranberry juice** for a balanced flavor profile. Key ingredients: **Jägermeister**, **peach schnapps**, **cranberry juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Jägermeister**, 45ml of **peach schnapps**, and 60ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.
5. Garnish with 3 strawberries.

cocktails.name: Remember the Maine
cocktails.description: Profile: A Manhattan variation with rye whisky, **Cherry Heering**, and a hint of **absinthe**. Key ingredients: **Cherry Heering**, **absinthe**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 20ml of **red vermouth**, 10ml of **cherry brandy**, and 1 drop of **absinthe**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Renaissance
cocktails.description: Profile: The renaissance cocktail is a spirit-forward drink characterised by its bittersweet profile and deep complexity. While there are several variations, the. Key ingredients: **brandy**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac**, 7.5ml of **limoncello**, 15ml of **red vermouth**, and 2 dashes of **peach bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Right Word
cocktails.description: Profile: A floral riff on the Last Word with **gin**, **st. Germain** and **Lillet Blanc**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **st. Germain**, **Lillet Blanc**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **st. Germain**, 30ml of **Lillet Blanc**, and 30ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Roasted Toasted Almond
cocktails.description: Profile: A stronger variation of the "toasted almond" with **vodka**. Key ingredients: **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 30ml of **amaretto**, 30ml of **coffee liqueur**, and 30ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktails.name: Rob Roy
cocktails.description: Profile: The drink is a variation of the **Manhattan** cocktail with **Scotch Whisky**. It is named for the Scottish folk hero Robert Roy MacGregor, the "Scottish. Key ingredients: **Manhattan**, **Scotch Whisky**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Scotch Whisky**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, and 3 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Robinson
cocktails.description: Profile: A refreshing and tropical long drink that combines the creamy sweetness of coconut with the crisp sparkle of **lemon-lime soda**. Perfect for easy sipping. Key ingredients: **lemon-lime soda**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **coconut liqueur** and 150ml of **Sprite**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with 2 **lime** slices and a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Rome is Burning
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and bold sparkling cocktail that balances the depth of **Cognac** and bitter vermouth with a touch of pomegranate and effervescent **Prosecco**. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **Prosecco**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac**, 22.5ml of **Punt e Mes**, 5ml of **grenadine**, 3ml of **creole bitters**, and 45ml of **Prosecco**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Rose
cocktails.description: Profile: An IBA official pre-dinner cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **dry vermouth**, 30ml of **kirsch**, and 3 dashes of **strawberry syrup**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Rosé Spritz
cocktails.description: Profile: A light and refreshing floral spritz that elegantly balances premium **vodka** with the delicate notes of rosé wine and the bright sweetness of **pink. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **pink lemonade**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a wine glass with **ice**.
2. Add 120ml of **Prosecco** and 120ml of **pink lemonade**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **strawberry**.

cocktails.name: Rossini
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated Italian classic and variation of the Bellini, featuring vibrant **strawberry** purée topped with crisp, chilled **Prosecco**. Key ingredients: **strawberry**, **Prosecco**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Purée or muddle 50g of fresh strawberries until smooth.
2. Pour the **strawberry** purée into a chilled **Champagne** flute.
3. Gently pour 100ml of chilled **Prosecco** into the glass.
4. Stir very slowly with a bar spoon to lift the purée and blend.
5. Garnish with a fresh **strawberry** on the rim.

cocktails.name: Roy Rogers
cocktails.description: Profile: A popular non-alcoholic mocktail that combines the deep caramel notes of **cola** with the sweet fruitiness of **grenadine**. Key ingredients: **cola**, **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 10ml of **grenadine** and 200ml of **cola**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with 5 maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Rum & Cola
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic, refreshing highball that perfectly balances the sweetness of **cola** with the crisp notes of **white rum**, accented by a bright citrus kick. Key ingredients: **cola**, **white rum**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 120ml of **cola**, and 2 wedges of **lime** to a highball glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with 2 **lime** slices.

cocktails.name: Rum Buck
cocktails.description: Profile: Cocktails from the "buck" family use **ginger ale** or **beer** and citrus juice with a base liquor. Key ingredients: **ginger ale**, **beer**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **white rum** and 120ml of **ginger ale**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Rum Eggnog
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy wine drink featuring **egg white**, **amontillado sherry**, **spiced rum**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **nutmeg**. Key ingredients: **egg white**, **amontillado sherry**, **spiced rum**, **nutmeg**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of **spiced rum**, 30ml of **amontillado sherry**, 30ml of **demerara sugar syrup**, 30ml of **milk**, 30ml of **cream**, and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over an **ice** cube.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg** and a **cinnamon** stick.

cocktails.name: Rum Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: Profile: A variation of the classic "Old Fashioned" cocktail with **aged rum** instead of **bourbon** or rye. Some recipes also suggest adding a small amount of. Key ingredients: **aged rum**, **bourbon**, **overproof rum**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 1 cube of **demerara sugar**, 1 splash of **water**, 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**, 2 dashes of **orange bitters**, 45ml of **dark rum**, 10ml of **overproof rum**, and 1 **maraschino cherry**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** peel.

cocktails.name: Rum Rickey
cocktails.description: Profile: ."Rickey" is a family of drinks made with some base liquor, **lime juice** and sparkling **water**. One of the most popular is the "**gin** rickey", which. Key ingredients: **lime juice**, **water**, **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 120ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with 2 **lime** slices.

cocktails.name: Rumplesnuggler
cocktails.description: Profile: A comforting and decadent winter warmer that combines the rich sweetness of hot **chocolate** with creamy **Baileys** and a sharp, refreshing peppermint. Key ingredients: **chocolate**, **Baileys**, **Rumple Minze**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare your hot **chocolate** in a separate container and ensure it is steaming hot.
2. Pour the **Baileys** **Irish cream** and **Rumple Minze** **peppermint schnapps** into an Irish coffee glass.
3. Fill the remainder of the glass with the hot **chocolate** and stir gently to combine.
4. Top with a generous dollop of **whipped cream**.

cocktails.name: Rusty Nail
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic, slow-sipping cocktail that highlights the smoky notes of **Scotch Whisky**, perfectly balanced by the sweet **honey** and herbal complexity of. Key ingredients: **Scotch Whisky**, **honey**, **Drambuie**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Scotch Whisky**, 15ml of **Drambuie**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Salty Dog
cocktails.description: Profile: The salty dog is a lot friendlier than it sounds. This classic cocktail is a modified greyhound (**gin** or **vodka** with **grapefruit juice**) that is. Key ingredients: **gin**, **vodka**, **grapefruit juice**, **salt**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin** and 90ml of **grapefruit juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with 5 **salt** gr and a **grapefruit** wedge.

cocktails.name: San Francisco
cocktails.description: Profile: This little-known cocktail first appeared in 1937 in the "Café Royal cocktail book", published by the uk bartenders guild.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 15ml of **triple sec**, 15ml of **banana liqueur**, 45ml of **pineapple juice**, 22.5ml of **orange juice**, 10ml of **grenadine**, and 7.5ml of **lime juice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled collins glass.
5. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge.

cocktails.name: Sangria
cocktails.description: Profile: A refreshing drink that is popular during the summer, especially in Spain and Portugal. The ingredients can be varied — you can use **white wine** instead. Key ingredients: **white wine**, **red wine**, **water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 750ml of **red wine**, half an **orange**, half a **lemon**, 50ml of **brandy**, 3 teaspoons of **sugar**, 200ml of **ginger ale**, and 200ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled pitcher.

cocktails.name: Sangrita
cocktails.description: Profile: A non-alcoholic drink that usually accompanies Tequila shots. You drink a shot of sangrita after taking a shot of Tequila. Many variations of the sangrita.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a pitcher with 300g of **ice**.
2. Add 600ml of **tomato juice**, 300ml of **orange juice**, 100ml of **lemon juice**, 20ml of **Tabasco**, 1 teaspoon of **black pepper**, and 1 teaspoon of **salt**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **chili pepper**.

cocktails.name: Santorini
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that captures the essence of the mediterranean. It balances the herbal depth of **red vermouth** with the smoky. Key ingredients: **red vermouth**, **Scotch Whisky**, **Ouzo**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **red vermouth**, 30ml of **Scotch Whisky**, and 7.5ml of **Ouzo**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.description: Profile: The quintessential new orleans classic. A complex and aromatic masterpiece featuring the spicy kick of rye or **Cognac**, sweetened slightly and brightened. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **anise**, **absinthe**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Rinse a chilled rocks glass with **absinthe**, swirling to coat the sides, and discard the excess.
2. In a separate mixing glass, muddle the **sugar** cube with **Peychaud's Bitters** until dissolved.
3. Add the **Cognac**(or **rye whiskey**) and fill the mixing glass with **ice**.
4. Stir well until the drink is properly chilled.
5. Strain the mixture into the prepared **absinthe**-rinsed glass without **ice**.
6. Express the oils of a **lemon** twist over the drink and garnish.

cocktails.name: Scarlett O'Hara
cocktails.description: Profile: A vibrant and refreshing long drink named after the iconic southern belle. It combines the unique stone-fruit flavors of **Southern Comfort** with tart. Key ingredients: **Southern Comfort**, **lime**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Southern Comfort**, 45ml of **cranberry juice**, and 15ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Scotch Point
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that balances the smoky depth of **Scotch Whisky** with the bitter-sweet complexity of **Punt e Mes** and the rich,. Key ingredients: **Scotch Whisky**, **Punt e Mes**, **ruby port**, **creole bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Scotch Whisky**, 15ml of **Punt e Mes**, 15ml of **ruby port**, and 1 dash of **creole bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** peel.

cocktails.name: Screaming Orgasm
cocktails.description: Profile: This screaming orgasm shot is a layered delight with **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **Irish cream**, and **amaretto**. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **Irish cream**, **amaretto**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour **coffee liqueur** into the base of a shot glass.
2. Layer on **amaretto**
3. Carefully add a layer of **Irish cream**.
4. Top with a layer of **vodka**.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.description: Profile: A world-famous, refreshing highball that perfectly marries the neutrality of **vodka** with the bright acidity of **orange juice**. Simple, classic, and an. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **orange juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **vodka** and 100ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Sea Breeze
cocktails.description: Profile: Cranberry and **grapefruit** highball spiked with **vodka**. Key ingredients: **grapefruit**, **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **vodka**, 120ml of **cranberry juice**, and 45ml of **grapefruit juice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Seventh Son
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and aromatic spirit-forward drink that balances the richness of **Cognac** with floral rose and deep **cherry** notes, finished with a crisp. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **cherry**, **lager**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Cognac**, 15ml of **Cherry Heering**, and 15ml of **rose syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled **Champagne** flute glass.
5. Top with 60ml of **pilsner lager**.

cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic, easy-drinking highball known for its vibrant layers and refreshing blend of **vodka**, **peach**, and tropical fruit juices. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **peach**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40ml of **vodka**, 20ml of **peach schnapps**, 40ml of **orange juice**, and 40ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Sex With an Alligator
cocktails.description: Profile: An eye-catching layered shooter that features a sweet melon and **pineapple** base with herbal and **raspberry** accents, served in a shooter glass. Key ingredients: **pineapple**, **raspberry**.
cocktails.instructions:
For two shots:
1. Add the **Midori Melon Liqueur** and **pineapple juice** to a cocktail shaker.
2. Shake vigorously until well-chilled.
3. Strain the mixture into two chilled shooter glasses.
4. Carefully pour the **Chambord** down the side of each glass so it sinks to the bottom.
5. Finish by slowly layering the **Jägermeister** on the very top using the back of a spoon.

cocktails.name: Sherry Cobbler
cocktails.description: Profile: Classic sherry cooler muddled with citrus and **berries**. Key ingredients: **berries**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle **orange** slices and **sugar** in a cup glass.
2. Add sherry and fill the cup with crushed **ice**.
3. Stir well.
4. Garnish with **orange** slices and **berries**.

cocktails.name: Shirley Temple
cocktails.description: Profile: A simple and popular non-alcoholic cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **ginger ale**, 60ml of **lemonade**, and 5ml of **grenadine**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.description: Profile: **Cognac** sour sweetened with **orange liqueur**. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **orange liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Cognac**, 20ml of **triple sec**, and 20ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **orange**.

cocktails.name: Silver Bay
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and warming **whiskey** cocktail that balances the smoky depth of **Islay Scotch Whisky** with the nutty sweetness of chestnut and. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **Islay Scotch Whisky**, **honey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine the **Islay Scotch Whisky**, **lemon juice**, **chestnut liqueur**, and **honey syrup** in a heat-resistant glass or mug.
2. Add the **whiskey-barrel aged bitters**.
3. Pour in the **boiling water** and stir gently to combine all ingredients.
4. Grate fresh **nutmeg** over the top for aroma.
5. Serve warm in a cocktail glass or toddy mug.

cocktails.name: Silver Bullet
cocktails.description: Profile: A potent and bold combination of **gin** and **kümmel liqueur**, designed for those who appreciate a strong, spirit-forward drink with a sharp, clean finish. Key ingredients: **gin**, **kümmel liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 22.5ml of **kümmel liqueur**, and 10ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **lemon**.

cocktails.name: Sin Limites
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright rum sour that artfully balances the aromatic warmth of **cardamom** with crisp **white rum**, smooth **vanilla**, and sharp citrus notes. Key ingredients: **cardamom**, **white rum**, **vanilla**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle the **cardamom** pods in the bottom of a cocktail shaker to release their essential oils.
2. Add the **white rum**, **lime juice**, **vanilla syrup**, and **strucchi bitter** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake vigorously.
4. Double-strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Singapore Sling
cocktails.description: Profile: A legendary tropical **gin**-based punch, famous for its complex fruity profile, vibrant pink hue, and refreshing botanical finish. Key ingredients: **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **Cherry Heering**, 7.5ml of **Cointreau**, 7.5ml of **Benedictine**, 120ml of **pineapple juice**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 10ml of **grenadine**, and 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **pineapple** and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Slippery Nipple
cocktails.description: Profile: A very smooth and beautiful shot.
cocktails.instructions:
1. If you use **grenadine** syrup, pour it on the bottom layer. 
2. Pour 20ml of **sambuca** into a shooter glass.
3. Carefully pour 20ml of **Baileys** on top of the **sambuca**.

cocktails.name: Smoky Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: Profile: A variation of the classic "whisky sour" created by Simon Difford for people who like the distinct smoky flavor of Scotch Islay Whisky.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of **Scotch Whisky**, 30ml of **Islay Scotch Whisky**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 20ml of **maple syrup**, 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over an **ice** cube.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** peel.

cocktails.name: Snakebite
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic British pub mix that blends the crispness of **apple cider** with the body of **lager**, finished with a sweet touch of blackcurrant. Key ingredients: **apple cider**, **lager**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 240ml of **apple cider**, 240ml of **beer**, and 1 dash of **Crème de Cassis** to a pub glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Sneaky Pete
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold and creamy variation of the white lebowski, swapping **vodka** for the spicy, robust notes of **rye whiskey**. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **rye whiskey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **rye whiskey**, 30ml of **coffee liqueur**, and 30ml of **milk**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Snowball
cocktails.description: Profile: A festive and nostalgic favourite in the UK, this 'winter warmer' is sweet, fizzy, and pleasantly creamy.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **egg liqueur**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 60ml of **lemonade**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: South Side
cocktails.description: Profile: Herbal **gin** sour brightened with **mint**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **mint**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and 6 leaves of **mint**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a leaf of **mint**.

cocktails.name: Spiced Apple-Bourbon Punch
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright **whiskey** sour balancing **apple cider**, **bourbon**, **apple brandy** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **apple cider**, **bourbon**, **apple brandy**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **apple cider**, 45ml of **bourbon**, 15ml of **apple brandy**, 22.5ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **demerara sugar syrup**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with 2 **cloves**.

cocktails.name: Spiced Rum Milk Punch
cocktails.description: Profile: A creamy, comforting punch blending **spiced rum** with **milk**, **vanilla**, and warm winter spices for a smooth dessert-like finish. Key ingredients: **spiced rum**, **milk**, **vanilla**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **spiced rum**, 90ml of **milk**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 1 drop of **vanilla extract**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a pinch of **cinnamon** and a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Spicy Fifty
cocktails.description: Profile: An elegant yet bold **vanilla** **vodka** sour that perfectly balances the floral notes of elderflower with the sharp heat of fresh red chili. Key ingredients: **vanilla**, **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place a slice of red **chili pepper** in the bottom of a cocktail shaker and muddle gently to release the heat.
2. Add the **vanilla** **vodka**, **elderflower cordial**, **lemon juice**, and **honey syrup**.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice** and shake hard until well-chilled.
4. Fine strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass to remove chili seeds and pulp.
5. Garnish with a fresh red chili slice.

cocktails.name: Spritz Veneziano
cocktails.description: Profile: An IBA official sparkling cocktail. **Prosecco** is recommended for the **sparkling wine**. Key ingredients: **Prosecco**, **sparkling wine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a wine glass with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **Prosecco**, 60ml of **Select**, and 30ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Squashed Frog
cocktails.description: Profile: Despite its name, this layered shot is very mild and sweet.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 5ml of **grenadine** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully add 30ml of **melon liqueur**.
3. Add 15ml of **egg liqueur** on top using a bar spoon.

cocktails.name: Stay Sober
cocktails.description: Profile: A delightful, refreshing non-alcoholic cocktail. The ratio of ingredients can be varied according to your taste.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **apple juice**, 30ml of **cranberry juice**, and 90ml of **ginger beer**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** slice.

cocktails.name: Stinger
cocktails.description: Profile: **Brandy** and Crème de Menthe served straight up. Key ingredients: **Brandy**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Cognac**, 20ml of **Crème de Menthe White**, and 2 **mint**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Stone Fence
cocktails.description: Profile: A historic American colonial classic that combines the robust warmth of **rye whiskey** with the crisp, refreshing profile of **apple cider**. This version. Key ingredients: **rye whiskey**, **apple cider**, **bitters**, **mint**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a pub glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 440ml of **apple cider**, and 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **mint** sprig.

cocktails.name: Strawberry Colada
cocktails.description: Profile: A vibrant and fruity twist on the traditional piña colada. This tropical delight blends **white rum** and creamy coconut with the sweet, tart flavor of. Key ingredients: **white rum**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a blender with 150g of **ice** or crushed **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **white rum** and 20ml of **strawberry liqueur**.
3. Add 50g of fresh strawberries (or **strawberry** puree), 30ml of **coconut cream**, and 90ml of **pineapple juice**.
4. Blend on high speed until the mixture reaches a smooth, slushy consistency.
5. Pour the contents into a hurricane or chilled goblet glass.
6. Garnish with a **strawberry**.
7. Optionally, top with a dollop of **whipped cream** for extra decadence.

cocktails.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright rum sour that perfectly balances fruity **strawberry liqueur** with the crispness of **white rum** and fresh **lime**. A pinch of **salt** and. Key ingredients: **strawberry liqueur**, **white rum**, **lime**, **salt**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **white rum**, 30ml of **strawberry liqueur**, 30ml of **lime juice**, 15ml of **rich simple syrup**, 0.5 pinches of **black pepper**, and 0.5ml of **salt**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **strawberry** and a slice of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Strawberry Margarita
cocktails.description: Profile: A luscious and bold twist on the classic Margarita, combining the earthy notes of **Tequila blanco** with sweet strawberries and the **orange** accents of. Key ingredients: **Tequila blanco**, **orange**, **Cointreau**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine 40g of fresh strawberries, 60ml of **Tequila blanco**, 40ml of **Cointreau**, and 30ml of **lime juice** in a blender.
2. Add 150g of **ice**.
3. Blend until the texture is perfectly smooth and frozen.
4. Optional: rim your Margarita glass with **salt** or **sugar** if desired.
5. Pour the blended cocktail into the prepared glass.
6. Finish with a **strawberry** garnish.

cocktails.name: Streamtini
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated spirit-forward cocktail that balances the botanical notes of **vodka** with the sweet, tart profile of **blueberry schnapps** and. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **blueberry schnapps**, **cranberry juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **blueberry schnapps**, 30ml of **vodka**, and 60ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Suburban
cocktails.description: Profile: A robust and complex cocktail reminiscent of an Old Fashioned. It features a rich blend of **bourbon**, **dark rum**, and **port** wine, accented by the. Key ingredients: **bourbon**, **dark rum**, **port**, **bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **bourbon**, 25ml of **dark rum**, 25ml of **tawny port**, 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**, and 1 dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** peel.

cocktails.name: Suffering Bastard
cocktails.description: Profile: A refreshing and historic highball that combines the punch of **gin** and **brandy** with the zesty kick of **lime** and the spicy effervescence of **ginger. Key ingredients: **gin**, **brandy**, **lime**, **ginger beer**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **Cognac**, 30ml of **gin**, 15ml of **lime juice**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fill a chilled tiki glass with fresh **ice** and strain the cocktail into it.
5. Top with 90ml of **ginger beer**.
6. Garnish with a **mint** sprig and an **orange** slice.

cocktails.name: Suze & Tonic
cocktails.description: Profile: **Suze** & **tonic** is a refreshing cocktail with a relatively low alcohol level compared to **gin**. Key ingredients: **Suze**, **tonic**, **gin**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Suze** and 90ml of **tonic**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktails.name: Sweet Martini
cocktails.description: Profile: This is a variation of the Martini cocktail with sweet **red vermouth** instead of **dry vermouth**. The **vodka** to vermouth ratio can be varied according. Key ingredients: **red vermouth**, **dry vermouth**, **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **gin** and 60ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Swimming Pool
cocktails.description: Profile: A tropical cocktail with **vodka**, rum, coconut and **pineapple** flavors. Key ingredients: **vodka**, **pineapple**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **vodka**, 60ml of **white rum**, 15ml of **cream**, 30ml of **coconut milk**, 60ml of **pineapple juice**, and 15ml of **Blue Curaçao**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **pineapple**.

cocktails.name: Symphony
cocktails.description: Profile: A custom mix of **gin**, maraschino liqueur, **green Chartreuse** and a smoky **Laphroaig** float. Key ingredients: **gin**, **green Chartreuse**, **Laphroaig**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 20ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 10ml of **green Chartreuse**, and 20ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Float 5ml of **Laphroaig** on top.

cocktails.name: Szarlotka
cocktails.description: Profile: A simple polish cocktail pairing **Żubrówka** with **apple juice** and **cinnamon**. Key ingredients: **Żubrówka**, **apple juice**, **cinnamon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Żubrówka**, 120ml of **apple juice**, and 1 pinch of **cinnamon**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **cinnamon** stick and an **apple** wedge.

cocktails.name: Tarzan
cocktails.description: Profile: A refreshing long drink of **gin**, **Campari** and **pineapple juice** topped with soda. Key ingredients: **gin**, **Campari**, **pineapple juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **Campari**, 45ml of **pineapple juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, and 90ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Temperance Punch
cocktails.description: Profile: A refreshing and vibrant non-alcoholic punch that balances the sweetness of grape and **orange** juices with a sharp citrus kick and a bubbly finish. Key ingredients: **orange**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **grape juice**, 30ml of **orange juice**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, and 1ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Tequila Rickey
cocktails.description: Profile: A crisp, **sugar**-free classic from the rickey family that highlights the earthy notes of Tequila with fresh **lime** and sparkling **water**. Key ingredients: **sugar**, **lime**, **water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila blanco**, 30ml of **lime juice**, and 100ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktails.name: Tequila Slammer
cocktails.description: Profile: A high-energy drink that combines Tequila and **lemon-lime soda**, traditionally served with a quick slam to activate carbonation. Key ingredients: **lemon-lime soda**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila blanco** and 50ml of **7-Up**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.description: Profile: Tequila and **orange** highball layered with **grenadine**. Key ingredients: **orange**, **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add Tequila and **orange juice** and stir.
3. Slowly pour **grenadine** to create a sunrise effect.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **cherry**.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise (shot)
cocktails.description: Profile: Tequila and **orange** shot layered with **grenadine**. Key ingredients: **orange**, **grenadine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of **orange juice** into a shooter glass.
2. Pour 15ml of **grenadine**.
3. Very carefully pour 15ml of **Tequila blanco** on the top.

cocktails.name: That's My Word
cocktails.description: Profile: A floral riff on the Last Word with **gin**, **st. Germain** and **yellow Chartreuse**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **st. Germain**, **yellow Chartreuse**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **gin**, 30ml of **st. Germain**, 30ml of **yellow Chartreuse**, and 7.5ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.

cocktails.name: The Cheshire Cat
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward **brandy** cocktail that balances the herbal notes of **rosemary** with the deep complexity of **Cognac** and **Scotch. Key ingredients: **brandy**, **rosemary**, **Cognac**, **Scotch Whisky**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Gently muddle the fresh **rosemary** sprig in the bottom of a mixing glass to release its aromatic oils.
2. Add the **Cognac**, **Scotch Whisky**, **Cherry Heering**, **Punt e Mes**, and **cinnamon syrup** to the mixing glass.
3. Fill the glass with **ice** and stir well for about 20-30 seconds until properly chilled and diluted.
4. Strain the mixture into a rocks glass over 120g **ice** (a large cube or fresh serving **ice**).
5. Express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and discard the peel or use it as garnish.
6. Garnish with a fresh **rosemary** sprig and a **cinnamon** stick for a fragrant presentation.

cocktails.name: The Haole
cocktails.description: Profile: A bright and tropical highball that captures the essence of a summer afternoon. This refreshing blend features **white rum** and **bianco vermouth**. Key ingredients: **white rum**, **bianco vermouth**, **pineapple**, **lemon**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **white rum**, 10ml of **bianco vermouth**, 15ml of **pineapple syrup** and 20ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fill a chilled collins glass with **ice** and strain the cocktail into the glass.
5. Top with 90ml of **ginger ale** and stir gently to combine.
6. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge.

cocktails.name: The Ridgwell
cocktails.description: Profile: A bold and layered **whiskey** cocktail that bridges the gap between a Manhattan and a bramble. The combination of **bourbon** and rye provides a sturdy. Key ingredients: **whiskey**, **bourbon**, **Punt e Mes**, **strucchi bitter**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine the **bourbon**, **rye whiskey**, **Punt e Mes**, **strucchi bitter**(or **Campari**), and **Crème de Mure** in a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add the dashes of Angostura and **orange bitters**.
3. Stir well for 15-20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain the drink into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a fresh **blackberry** dropped into the glass or on a cocktail pick.

cocktails.name: The Slope
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that offers a perfect balance between the spice of **rye whiskey**, the herbal bitterness of **Punt e Mes**, and. Key ingredients: **rye whiskey**, **Punt e Mes**, **apricot brandy**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **rye whiskey**, 20ml of **Punt e Mes**, 10ml of **apricot brandy**, and 1 dash of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **dried apricot**.

cocktails.name: Three Dots and a Dash
cocktails.description: Profile: A classic tiki masterpiece created by Don the Beachcomber during WWII. Its name represents the morse code for 'Victory' (V), featuring a complex blend of.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Rhum Martinique Agricole**, 15ml of **aged rum**, 7.5ml of **falernum**, 7.5ml of **allspice dram**, 15ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **orange juice**, 15ml of **honey syrup**, 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**, and 1 slice of **pineapple**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled tiki glass.
5. Garnish with 3 maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Tiger's Milk
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy dessert cocktail often compared to eggnog or a milkshake-style serve.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 60ml of **Cognac**, 22.5ml of **milk**, 22.5ml of **heavy cream**, 7.5ml of **rich simple syrup**, 2 drops of **vanilla extract**, 1 pinch of **cinnamon**, and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Tintoretto
cocktails.description: Profile: A venetian classic, this cocktail is a vibrant variation of the Bellini. It pairs the crisp bubbles of **Prosecco** with the tart, ruby-red essence of fresh. Key ingredients: **Prosecco**, **pomegranate juice**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the **pomegranate juice** and **simple syrup** into the glass first, then stir to combine.
2. Slowly pour the chilled **Prosecco** over the juice.

cocktails.name: Tipperary
cocktails.description: Profile: **Irish whiskey** stirred with **green Chartreuse** and sweet vermouth. Key ingredients: **Irish whiskey**, **green Chartreuse**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Irish whiskey**, 25ml of **red vermouth**, 15ml of **green Chartreuse**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Toasted Almond
cocktails.description: Profile: A variation of this cocktail with **vodka** is called the "roasted toasted almond". Key ingredients: **vodka**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **amaretto**, 45ml of **coffee liqueur**, and 30ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktails.name: Tom & Cherry
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and vibrant twist on a **gin** sour, featuring the botanical richness of **old tom gin** paired with deep **cherry** notes and a hint of. Key ingredients: **gin**, **old tom gin**, **cherry**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **old tom gin**, 10ml of **Cherry Heering**, 10ml of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 10ml of **cherry juice**, 5ml of **grapefruit juice**, and 2.5ml of **strucchi bitter**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled nick & nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Tom & Jerry
cocktails.description: Profile: A legendary warm holiday punch that serves as a creamy, spiced embrace during the winter season.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Separate the **egg white** from the yolk and beat them in separate bowls until the whites are stiff and yolks are creamy.
2. Gently fold the **egg white** into the yolk in an Irish coffee glass.
3. Add 30ml of **dark rum**, 30ml of **Cognac**, and 15ml of **simple syrup**, to the **egg** mixture.
4. Fill the rest of the glass with hot **milk** while stirring gently to combine.
5. Garnish with a generous dusting of freshly grated **nutmeg**.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.description: Profile: A timeless IBA classic, this refreshing highball perfectly balances the sweetness of **old tom gin** with crisp citrus and sparkling **water**. Key ingredients: **old tom gin**, **water**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a collins glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **old tom gin**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **simple syrup**, and 60ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a **lemon** slice.

cocktails.name: Tommy's Margarita
cocktails.description: Profile: A simplified Margarita using **agave syrup** instead of **orange liqueur**. Key ingredients: **agave syrup**, **orange liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60ml of **Tequila blanco**, 30ml of **lemon juice**, and 30ml of **agave syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lime**.

cocktails.name: Tootsie Roll
cocktails.description: Profile: This nice and mild shot is an attempt to recall the famous "tootsie roll" candy. The recipe here is for 3–4 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **coffee liqueur**, 45ml of **orange juice**, and 45ml of **vodka**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.

cocktails.name: Triffle
cocktails.description: Profile: A layered shooter that balances sweet **grenadine** with creamy **egg liqueur** and **whipped cream**. Rich, dessert-like, and served as a quick indulgent sip. Key ingredients: **grenadine**, **egg liqueur**, **whipped cream**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 10ml of **grenadine** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 45ml of **egg liqueur** on the top.
3. Pour **whipped cream** on the top.

cocktails.name: Trinidad Sour
cocktails.description: Profile: **Bitters**-heavy sour with rye and orgeat for balance. Key ingredients: **Bitters**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **Angostura Bitters**, 30ml of almond(orgeat) syrup, 20ml of **lemon juice**, and 15ml of **rye whiskey**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.

cocktails.name: Tropical Bananarama
cocktails.description: Profile: A bananarama cocktail is a tropical, fruit-forward drink that typically features **banana liqueur** or purée as its primary flavour. Because it is a modern. Key ingredients: **banana liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **whiskey cream**, **cream**, half a fresh **banana**, and **ice** to a blender.
2. Blend until silky smooth.
3. Pour into a hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a fresh **banana** slice.

cocktails.name: Tropical Queen
cocktails.description: Profile: An elegant and exotic **gin**-based delight that balances the botanical notes of **gin** with creamy coconut and a warm hint of **cinnamon**. Fresh citrus. Key ingredients: **gin**, **cinnamon**, **grapefruit**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45ml of **gin**, 5ml of **coconut liqueur**, 5ml of **simple syrup**, 5ml of **cinnamon syrup**, 15ml of **lime juice**, 30ml of **grapefruit juice**, and 15ml of **coconut water**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **cinnamon sticks**.

cocktails.name: Tropical Sangria
cocktails.description: Profile: A light and effervescent twist on the classic Sangria. This refreshing pitcher drink features crisp **white wine** and coconut notes, macerated with fresh. Key ingredients: **white wine**, **orange**, **kiwi fruit**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a pitcher with **ice**.
2. Add 240ml of **coconut liqueur**, 750ml of **white wine**, 45ml of **simple syrup**, 120ml of **soda water**, 1 half of **orange**, 1 **kiwi fruit**, and 7 sliced strawberries.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Tuxedo
cocktails.description: Profile: A sophisticated and complex dry **gin** Martini variation from the late 19th Century. The addition of maraschino liqueur and a hint of **absinthe** creates. Key ingredients: **gin**, **absinthe**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **old tom gin**, 30ml of **dry vermouth**, 0.5 teaspoons of **Luxardo Maraschino**, 1 drop of **absinthe**, and 3 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Vacation in Jamaica
cocktails.description: Profile: A rich, creamy rum drink featuring **gold rum**, **coconut liqueur**, and **caramel syrup**. It is dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent, offering a tropical. Key ingredients: **gold rum**, **coconut liqueur**, **caramel syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place the **gold rum**, **coconut liqueur**, **caramel syrup**, **apple juice**, **heavy cream**, and **banana** into a blender.
2. Add the **ice**(150g) to the mixture.
3. Blend until the consistency is smooth and creamy.
4. Pour the contents into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with **coconut flakes**, a **banana** slice, and a sprig of fresh **mint**.

cocktails.name: Vampiro
cocktails.description: Profile: A vibrant and spicy Mexican-style cocktail. It is a savory blend of Tequila and fruit juices, enhanced with **honey**, onion, and chili for a complex, bold. Key ingredients: **honey**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50ml of **Tequila reposado**, 70ml of **tomato juice**, 30ml of **orange juice**, 7.5ml of **lime juice**, 1 teaspoon of **honey**, 0.5 peels of **silver onion**, 3 slices of red **chili pepper**, 3 drops of **worcestershire sauce**, and 1 pinch of **salt**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lime** and a slice of red **chili pepper**.

cocktails.name: Ve.n.to
cocktails.description: Profile: An elegant **grappa**-based sour that beautifully balances the intensity of the spirit with the soothing notes of chamomile and **honey syrup**. Key ingredients: **grappa**, **honey syrup**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of **grappa**, 25ml of **lemon juice**, 15ml of **honey syrup**, 15ml of **chamomile cordial**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add **ice** and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over an **ice** cube.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist and 3 **grapes**.

cocktails.name: Vegas Bomb
cocktails.description: Profile: A sweet and energetic bomb shot combining whisky, **peach schnapps** and **Red Bull**. Key ingredients: **peach schnapps**, **Red Bull**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 30ml of **rye whiskey**, 30ml of **peach schnapps**, and 150ml of **Red Bull** to a pub glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.

cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.description: Profile: James bond's Martini with **gin**, **vodka**, and **Lillet Blanc**. Key ingredients: **gin**, **vodka**, **Lillet Blanc**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add **gin**, **vodka**, and **Lillet Blanc** into a shaker with **ice**.
2. Shake well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Vieux Carré
cocktails.description: Profile: New orleans classic combining rye, **Cognac**, vermouth, and **Benedictine**. Key ingredients: **Cognac**, **Benedictine**.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30ml of **rye whiskey**, 30ml of **Cognac**, 30ml of **red vermouth**, 1 bar spoon of **Benedictine**, 2 dashes of **Peychaud's Bitters**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura Bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** twist.

cocktails.name: Vilno
cocktails.description: Profile: Despite its name, this layered shot is very mild and sweet.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of **grenadine** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully layer 15ml of **Crème de Menthe Green** over the back of a spoon.
3. Gently float 15ml of **Irish cream** on top to finish the layered shot.

cocktails.name: Virgin Bananarama
cocktails.description: Profile: A bananarama cocktail is a tropical, fruit-forward drink that typically features **banana liqueur** or purée as its primary flavour. Because it is a modern. Key ingredients: **banana liqueur**.
cocktails.instructions: 1. Combine all ingredients in a blender with **ice** and blend until smooth.

cocktails.name: Virgin Colada
cocktails.description: Profile: A non-alcoholic variation of the "piña colada".
cocktails.instructions:
1. Put some crushed **ice** into a blender.
2. Add **coconut milk** and **pineapple juice**.
3. Blend until smooth, and pour into a hurricane glass.
4. Top with **whipped cream**, and garnish with a **pineapple** wedge and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktails.name: Virgin Mary
cocktails.description: Profile: A non-alcoholic version of the "Bloody Mary" cocktail. It is also called the "bloody shame", "bloody virgin" or "bloody barbara".
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with **ice**.
2. Add 90ml of **tomato juice**, 0.25 halves of **lemon**, 1 dash of **Tabasco**, 2 dashes of **worcestershire sauce**, 1 pinch of **salt**, and 1 pinch of **black pepper**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **celery** stalk.

cocktails.name: Virgin Sangria
